word.kjv: These are the generations of Noah: Noah was a just man and perfect in his generations, and Noah walked with God.
word.thailand: ต่อไปนี้คือพงศ์พันธุ์ของโนอาห์ โนอาห์เป็นคนชอบธรรมและดีรอบคอบในสมัยของท่าน และโนอาห์ดำเนินกับพระเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Estas son las generaciones de Noé: Noé, varón justo, perfecto fué en sus generaciones; con Dios caminó Noé.
word.latinvulgate: Hæ sunt generationes Noë : Noë vir justus atque perfectus fuit in generationibus suis ; cum Deo ambulavit.
word.italian1927: Questa è la posterità di Noè. Noè fu uomo giusto, integro, ai suoi tempi; Noè camminò con Dio.
word.german1912: Dies ist das Geschlecht Noahs. Noah war ein frommer Mann und ohne Tadel und führte ein göttliches Leben zu seinen Zeiten.
word.french1910: Voici la postérité de Noé. Noé était un homme juste et intègre dans son temps; Noé marchait avec Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以下是挪亞的後代。挪亞是個義人，是當時一個完全人。挪亞和　神同行。
word.korean: 노아의 사적은 이러하니라 노아는 의인이요 당세에 완전한 자라 그가 하나님과 동행하였으며
word.tagalog: Ito ang mga lahi ni Noe. Si Noe ay lalaking matuwid at sakdal noong kapanahunan niya: si Noe ay lumalakad na kasama ng Dios.
word.maori: Ko nga whakatupuranga enei o Noa: ko Noa he tangata tika, he ngakau tapatahi i ona whakatupuranga: i haereere tahi a Noa i te Atua.
word.cebuano: Kini mao ang mga kaliwatan ni Noe: si Noe maoy usa ka tawo nga matarung ug hingpit sa iyang mga kaliwatan. Si Noe nagalakaw uban sa Dios.
word.hebrew: ט אלה תולדת נח--נח איש צדיק תמים היה בדרתיו  את האלהים התהלך נח
word.hebrewmodern: אלה תולדת נח נח איש צדיק תמים היה בדרתיו את האלהים התהלך נח׃
word.greekot: αὗται δὲ αἱ γενέσεις νωε νωε ἄνθρωπος δίκαιος τέλειος ὢν ἐν τῇ γενεᾷ αὐτοῦ τῷ θεῷ εὐηρέστησεν νωε

word.kjv: And when Abram was ninety years old and nine, the LORD appeared to Abram, and said unto him, I am the Almighty God; walk before me, and be thou perfect.
word.thailand: เมื่ออายุอับรามได้เก้าสิบเก้าปี พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงประกฎแก่อับรามและตรัสแก่ท่านว่า "เราเป็นพระเจ้า ผู้ทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์ จงดำเนินอยู่ต่อหน้าเราและเจ้าจงเป็นคนดีรอบคอบ
word.spanish1909: Y SIENDO Abram de edad de noventa y nueve años, aparecióle Jehová, y le dijo: Yo soy el Dios Todopoderoso; anda delante de mí, y sé perfecto.
word.latinvulgate: Postquam vero nonaginta et novem annorum esse cœperat, apparuit ei Dominus, dixitque ad eum : Ego Deus omnipotens : ambula coram me, et esto perfectus.
word.italian1927: Quando Abramo fu d’età di novantanove anni, l’Eterno gli apparve e gli disse: "Io sono l’Iddio onnipotente; cammina alla mia presenza, e sii integro;
word.german1912: Als nun Abram neunundneunzig Jahre alt war, erschien ihm der HERR und sprach zu ihm: Ich bin der allmächtige Gott; wandle vor mir und sei fromm.
word.french1910: Lorsque Abram fut âgé de quatre-vingt-dix-neuf ans, l'Eternel apparut à Abram, et lui dit: Je suis le Dieu tout-puissant. Marche devant ma face, et sois intègre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 亞伯蘭改名亞伯拉罕亞伯蘭九十九歲的時候，耶和華向他顯現，對他說：“我是全能的　神，你要在我面前行事為人；你要作完全人。
word.korean: 아브람의 구십 구세 때에 여호와께서 아브람에게 나타나서 그에게 이르시되 나는 전능한 하나님이라 ! 너는 내 앞에서 행하여 완전하라 !
word.tagalog: At nang si Abram ay may siyam na pu't siyam na taon, ay napakita ang Panginoon kay Abram, at sa kaniya'y nagsabi, Ako ang Dios na Makapangyarihan sa lahat lumakad ka sa harapan ko, at magpakasakdal ka.
word.maori: ¶ A, i te mea ka iwa tekau ma iwa nga tau o Aperama, ka puta mai a Ihowa ki a Aperama, ka mea ki a ia, Ko ahau te Atua Kaha Rawa; haereere i mua i toku aroaro, kia tapatahi hoki te whakaaro.
word.cebuano: Ug sa may panuigon si Abram nga kasiyaman ug siyam ka tuig, mitungha kaniya si Jehova, ug miingon kaniya: Ako mao ang Dios nga Makagagahum sa ngatanan; lumakaw ka sa atubangan ko, ug magmahingpit ka.
word.hebrew: א ויהי אברם בן תשעים שנה ותשע שנים וירא יהוה אל אברם ויאמר אליו אני אל שדי--התהלך לפני והיה תמים
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי אברם בן תשעים שנה ותשע שנים וירא יהוה אל אברם ויאמר אליו אני אל שדי התהלך לפני והיה תמים׃
word.greekot: ἐγένετο δὲ αβραμ ἐτῶν ἐνενήκοντα ἐννέα καὶ ὤφθη κύριος τῷ αβραμ καὶ εἶπεν αὐτῷ ἐγώ εἰμι ὁ θεός σου εὐαρέστει ἐναντίον ἐμοῦ καὶ γίνου ἄμεμπτος

word.kjv: And whosoever offereth a sacrifice of peace offerings unto the LORD to accomplish his vow, or a freewill offering in beeves or sheep, it shall be perfect to be accepted; there shall be no blemish therein.
word.thailand: เมื่อคนใดถวายเครื่องสันติบูชาแด่พระเยโฮวาห์ เพื่อทำตามคำปฏิญาณหรือถวายด้วยใจสมัคร เป็นสัตว์ที่ได้มาจากฝูงวัว หรือฝูงแพะแกะ สัตว์นั้นต้องไม่มีตำหนิจึงจะเป็นที่โปรดปราน อย่าให้สัตว์นั้นมีที่ติเลย
word.spanish1909: Asimismo, cuando alguno ofreciere sacrificio de paces á Jehová para presentar voto, ú ofreciendo voluntariamente, sea de vacas ó de ovejas, sin tacha será acepto; no ha de haber en él falta.
word.latinvulgate: Homo qui obtulerit victimam pacificorum Domino, vel vota solvens, vel sponte offerens, tam de bobus quam de ovibus, immaculatum offeret ut acceptabile sit : omnis macula non erit in eo.
word.italian1927: Quand’uno offrirà all’Eterno un sacrifizio di azioni di grazie, di buoi o di pecore, sia per sciogliere un voto, sia come offerta volontaria, la vittima, perché sia gradita, dovrà esser perfetta: non dovrà aver difetti.
word.german1912: Und wer ein Dankopfer dem HERRN tun will, ein besonderes Gelübde oder von freiem Willen, von Rindern oder Schafen, das soll ohne Gebrechen sein, daß es angenehm sei; es soll keinen Fehl haben.
word.french1910: Si un homme offre à l'Eternel du gros ou du menu bétail en sacrifice d'actions de grâces, soit pour l'accomplissement d'un voeu, soit comme offrande volontaire, la victime sera sans défaut, afin qu'elle soit agréée; il n'y aura en elle aucun défaut.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 人若是為了還願，或是甘心把牛羊獻給耶和華作平安祭，總要獻上一隻完全、沒有任何瑕疵的祭物，才蒙悅納。
word.korean: 무릇 서원한 것을 갚으려든지 자의로 예물을 드리려든지 하여 소나 양으로 화목제 희생을 여호와께 드리는 자는 열납되도록 아무 흠이 없는 온전한 것으로 할지니
word.tagalog: At sinomang maghandog sa Panginoon ng haing handog tungkol sa kapayapaan, sa pagtupad ng isang panata o kaya'y kusang handog, na mula sa bakahan o sa kawan ay kinakailangang sakdal, upang tanggapin; anomang kapintasan ay huwag magkakaroon.
word.maori: Ki te whakaherea ano hoki e tetahi he patunga mo te pai ki a Ihowa, hei whakamana mo te ki taurangi, hei whakahere tuku noa ake ranei, he kau, he hipi ranei, hei te mea kohakore, kia manakohia ai: kei whai koha.
word.cebuano: Ug bisan kinsa nga magahalad ug mga halad-sa-pakigdait alang kang Jehova, sa pagtuman ug usa ka panaad, kun magahalad sa halad-nga-kinabubut-on gikan sa panon sa vaca, kun sa panon sa carnero, kinahanglan nga kana hingpit aron pagadawaton; kinahanglan nga walay ikasaway.
word.hebrew: כא ואיש כי יקריב זבח שלמים ליהוה לפלא נדר או לנדבה בבקר או בצאן--תמים יהיה לרצון כל מום לא יהיה בו
word.hebrewmodern: ואיש כי יקריב זבח שלמים ליהוה לפלא נדר או לנדבה בבקר או בצאן תמים יהיה לרצון כל מום לא יהיה בו׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἄνθρωπος ὃς ἂν προσενέγκῃ θυσίαν σωτηρίου τῷ κυρίῳ διαστείλας εὐχὴν κατὰ αἵρεσιν ἢ ἐν ταῖς ἑορταῖς ὑμῶν ἐκ τῶν βουκολίων ἢ ἐκ τῶν προβάτων ἄμωμον ἔσται εἰς δεκτόν πᾶς μῶμος οὐκ ἔσται ἐν αὐτῷ

word.kjv: Thou shalt be perfect with the LORD thy God.
word.thailand: ท่านทั้งหลายจงเป็นคนปราศจากตำหนิต่อพระพักตร์พระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของท่าน
word.spanish1909: Perfecto serás con Jehová tu Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Perfectus eris, et absque macula cum Domino Deo tuo.
word.italian1927: Tu sarai integro verso l’Eterno, l’Iddio tuo;
word.german1912: Du aber sollst rechtschaffen sein mit dem HERRN, deinem Gott.
word.french1910: Tu seras entièrement à l'Eternel, ton Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要在耶和華你的　神面前作完全人。
word.korean: 너는 네 하나님 여호와 앞에 완전하라 !
word.tagalog: Ikaw ay magpapakasakdal sa Panginoon mong Dios.
word.maori: Kia tino tika koe i te aroaro o Ihowa, o tou Atua.
word.cebuano: Magmahingpit ikaw uban kang Jehova nga imong Dios.
word.hebrew: יג תמים תהיה עם יהוה אלהיך
word.hebrewmodern: תמים תהיה עם יהוה אלהיך׃
word.greekot: τέλειος ἔσῃ ἐναντίον κυρίου τοῦ θεοῦ σου

word.kjv: But thou shalt have a perfect and just weight, a perfect and just measure shalt thou have: that thy days may be lengthened in the land which the LORD thy God giveth thee.
word.thailand: ท่านจงมีลูกตุ้มอันสมบูรณ์และเที่ยงตรงและมีถังตวงอันสมบูรณ์และเที่ยงตรง เพื่อว่าวันคืนของท่านจะยืนนานในแผ่นดินซึ่งพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของท่านประทานแก่ท่าน
word.spanish1909: Pesas cumplidas y justas tendrás; epha cabal y justo tendrás: para que tus días sean prolongados sobre la tierra que Jehová tu Dios te da.
word.latinvulgate: Pondus habebis justum et verum, et modius æqualis et verus erit tibi : ut multo vivas tempore super terram, quam Dominus Deus tuus dederit tibi.
word.italian1927: Terrai pesi esatti e giusti, terrai misure esatte e giuste, affinché i tuoi giorni siano prolungati sulla terra che l’Eterno, l’Iddio tuo, ti dà.
word.german1912: Du sollst ein völlig und recht Gewicht und einen völligen und rechten Scheffel haben, auf daß dein Leben lange währe in dem Lande, das dir der HERR, dein Gott, geben wird.
word.french1910: Tu auras un poids exact et juste, tu auras un épha exact et juste, afin que tes jours se prolongent dans le pays que l'Eternel, ton Dieu, te donne.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要有準確公正的法碼，你要有準確公正的升斗，好使你在耶和華你的　神賜給你的地上，得享長壽。
word.korean: 오직 십분 공정한 저울추를 두며 십분 공정한 되를 둘 것이라 그리하면 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅에서 네 날이 장구하리라
word.tagalog: Isang tunay at tapat na takalan magkakaroon ka; isang tunay at tapat na takalan magkakaroon ka: upang ang iyong mga araw ay tumagal sa ibabaw ng lupaing ibinibigay sa iyo ng Panginoon mong Dios.
word.maori: Hei te mea rite tonu, hei te mea tika, tau kohatu pauna; hei te mea rite tonu, hei te mea tika, tau mehua: kia roa ai ou ra ki te whenua e homai nei e Ihowa, e tou Atua, ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Magabaton ka ug timbangan nga hingpit ug matarung: magabaton ka ug taksanan nga hingpit ug matarung: aron pahalugwayan ang imong mga adlaw sa yuta nga ginahatag kanimo ni Jehova nga imong Dios.
word.hebrew: טו אבן שלמה וצדק יהיה לך איפה שלמה וצדק יהיה לך--למען יאריכו ימיך על האדמה אשר יהוה אלהיך נתן לך
word.hebrewmodern: אבן שלמה וצדק יהיה לך איפה שלמה וצדק יהיה לך למען יאריכו ימיך על האדמה אשר יהוה אלהיך נתן לך׃
word.greekot: στάθμιον ἀληθινὸν καὶ δίκαιον ἔσται σοι καὶ μέτρον ἀληθινὸν καὶ δίκαιον ἔσται σοι ἵνα πολυήμερος γένῃ ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς ἧς κύριος ὁ θεός σου δίδωσίν σοι ἐν κλήρῳ

word.kjv: He is the Rock, his work is perfect: for all his ways are judgment: a God of truth and without iniquity, just and right is he.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงเป็นศิลา พระราชกิจของพระองค์ก็สมบูรณ์ พระมรรคาทั้งหลายของพระองค์ก็ยุติธรรม พระเจ้าที่เที่ยงธรรมและปราศจากความชั่วช้า พระองค์ทรงยุติธรรมและเที่ยงตรง
word.spanish1909: El es la Roca, cuya obra es perfecta, Porque todos sus caminos son rectitud: Dios de verdad, y ninguna iniquidad en él: Es justo y recto.
word.latinvulgate: Dei perfecta sunt opera, et omnes viæ ejus judicia : Deus fidelis, et absque ulla iniquitate, justus et rectus.
word.italian1927: Quanto alla Ròcca, l’opera sua è perfetta, poiché tutte le sue vie sono giustizia. E’ un Dio fedele e senza iniquità; egli è giusto e retto.
word.german1912: Er ist ein Fels. Seine Werke sind unsträflich; denn alles, was er tut, das ist recht. Treu ist Gott und kein Böses an ihm; gerecht und fromm ist er.
word.french1910: Il est le rocher; ses oeuvres sont parfaites, Car toutes ses voies sont justes; C'est un Dieu fidèle et sans iniquité, Il est juste et droit.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他是磐石，他的作為完全，因為他一切所行的全都公平；他是誠實無偽的　神，又公義，又正直。
word.korean: 그는 반석이시니 그 공덕이 완전하고 그 모든 길이 공평하며 진실무망하신 하나님이시니 공의로우시고 정직하시도다
word.tagalog: Siya ang Bato, ang kaniyang gawa ay sakdal; Sapagka't lahat niyang daan ay kahatulan: Isang Dios na tapat at walang kasamaan, Matuwid at banal siya.
word.maori: Ko te Kamaka, tika tonu tana mahi; he whakarite tikanga nei hoki ona huarahi katoa: he Atua pono, kahore ona he, he tika, he tapatahi ia.
word.cebuano: Ang Bato ang iyang buhat hingpit man; Kay ang tanan niya nga mga dalan mga matul-id: Dios sa pagkamatinumanon, ug walay kasal-anan: Siya matarung ug matul-id.
word.hebrew: ד הצור תמים פעלו  {ס}  כי כל דרכיו משפט  {ר} אל אמונה ואין עול  {ס}  צדיק וישר הוא  {ר}
word.hebrewmodern: הצור תמים פעלו כי כל דרכיו משפט אל אמונה ואין עול צדיק וישר הוא׃
word.greekot: θεός ἀληθινὰ τὰ ἔργα αὐτοῦ καὶ πᾶσαι αἱ ὁδοὶ αὐτοῦ κρίσεις θεὸς πιστός καὶ οὐκ ἔστιν ἀδικία δίκαιος καὶ ὅσιος κύριος

word.kjv: Therefore Saul said unto the LORD God of Israel, Give a perfect lot. And Saul and Jonathan were taken: but the people escaped.
word.thailand: ดังนั้นซาอูลจึงทูลพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าแห่งอิสราเอลว่า "ขอทรงสำแดงฝ่ายถูก" ข้างฝ่ายซาอูลและโยนาธานถูกสลาก แต่ฝ่ายประชาชนรอดไป
word.spanish1909: Entonces dijo Saúl á Jehová Dios de Israel: Da perfección. Y fueron tomados Jonathán y Saúl, y el pueblo salió libre.
word.latinvulgate: Et dixit Saul ad Dominum Deum Israël : Domine Deus Israël, da indicium : quid est quod non responderis servo tuo hodie ? Si in me, aut in Jonatha filio meo, est iniquitas hæc, da ostensionem : aut si hæc iniquitas est in populo tuo, da sanctitatem. Et deprehensus est Jonathas ad Saul, populus autem exivit.
word.italian1927: Saul disse all’Eterno: "Dio d’Israele, fa’ conoscere la verità!" E Gionathan e Saul furon designati dalla sorte, e il popolo scampò.
word.german1912: Und Saul sprach zu dem HERRN, dem Gott Israels: Schaffe Recht! Da ward Jonathan und Saul getroffen; aber das Volk ging frei aus.
word.french1910: Saül dit à l'Eternel: Dieu d'Israël! fais connaître la vérité. Jonathan et Saül furent désignés, et le peuple fut libéré.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 掃羅禱告耶和華以色列的　神說：“求你指示實情！”於是抽籤，抽中了約拿單和掃羅；眾民都沒事。
word.korean: 이에 사울이 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와께 아뢰되 `원컨대 실상을 보이소서' 하였더니 요나단과 사울이 뽑히고 백성은 면한지라
word.tagalog: Kaya sinabi ni Saul sa Panginoon, sa Dios ng Israel, Ituro mo ang matuwid. At si Jonathan at si Saul ay napili: nguni't ang bayan ay nakatanan.
word.maori: Katahi a Haora ka mea ki a Ihowa, ki te Atua o Iharaira, Kia tika te homaitanga o te rota. Na ka mau ko Honatana raua ko Haora; i mawhiti hoki te iwi.
word.cebuano: Busa si Saul miingon kang Jehova, ang Dios sa Israel: Ipakita ang katul-id. Ug si Jonathan ug si Saul nakuha pinaagi sa pagpapalad , apan ang katawohan nakagawas.
word.hebrew: מא ויאמר שאול אל יהוה אלהי ישראל--הבה תמים וילכד יונתן ושאול והעם יצאו
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר שאול אל יהוה אלהי ישראל הבה תמים וילכד יונתן ושאול והעם יצאו׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπεν σαουλ κύριε ὁ θεὸς ισραηλ τί ὅτι οὐκ ἀπεκρίθης τῷ δούλῳ σου σήμερον εἰ ἐν ἐμοὶ ἢ ἐν ιωναθαν τῷ υἱῷ μου ἡ ἀδικία κύριε ὁ θεὸς ισραηλ δὸς δήλους καὶ ἐὰν τάδε εἴπῃς ἐν τῷ λαῷ σου ισραηλ δὸς δὴ ὁσιότητα καὶ κληροῦται ιωναθαν καὶ σαουλ καὶ ὁ λαὸς ἐξῆλθεν

word.kjv: As for God, his way is perfect; the word of the LORD is tried: he is a buckler to all them that trust in him.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเจ้า พระมรรคาของพระองค์บริสุทธิ์หมดจด พระวจนะของพระเยโฮวาห์พิสูจน์แล้ว พระองค์ทรงเป็นดั้งของบรรดาผู้ที่วางใจในพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Dios, perfecto su camino: La palabra de Jehová purificada, Escudo es de todos los que en él esperan.
word.latinvulgate: Deus, immaculata via ejus, eloquium Domini igne examinatum : scutum est omnium sperantium in se.
word.italian1927: La via di Dio è perfetta, la parola dell’Eterno è purgata col fuoco. Egli è lo scudo di tutti quelli che sperano in lui.
word.german1912: Gottes Wege sind vollkommen; des HERRN Reden sind durchläutert. Er ist ein Schild allen, die ihm vertrauen.
word.french1910: Les voies de Dieu sont parfaites, La parole de l'Eternel est éprouvée; Il est un bouclier pour tous ceux qui se confient en lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這位　神，他的道路是完全的；耶和華的話是煉淨的；凡是投靠他的，他都作他們的盾牌。
word.korean: 하나님의 도는 완전하고 여호와의 말씀은 정미하니 저는 자기에게 피하는 모든 자에게 방패시로다
word.tagalog: Tungkol sa Dios, ang kaniyang lakad ay sakdal; Ang salita ng Panginoon ay subok; Siya'y kalasag sa lahat ng sa kaniya'y kumakanlong.
word.maori: Tena ko te Atua, tika tonu tona ara; he parakore te kupu a Ihowa; he whakangungu rakau ia ki te hunga katoa e whakawhirinaki ana ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Mahitungod sa Dios, ang iyang dalan hingpit: Ang pulong ni Jehova nasulayan; Siya maoy usa ka taming niadtong tanan nga modangop kaniya.
word.hebrew: לא האל תמים דרכו אמרת יהוה צרופה--  {ס}  מגן הוא לכל החסים בו  {ר}
word.hebrewmodern: האל תמים דרכו אמרת יהוה צרופה מגן הוא לכל החסים בו׃
word.greekot: ὁ ἰσχυρός ἄμωμος ἡ ὁδὸς αὐτοῦ τὸ ῥῆμα κυρίου κραταιόν πεπυρωμένον ὑπερασπιστής ἐστιν πᾶσιν τοῖς πεποιθόσιν ἐπ' αὐτῷ

word.kjv: God is my strength and power: and he maketh my way perfect.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าทรงเป็นป้อมเข้มแข็งของข้าพเจ้า และพระองค์ทรงทำให้ทางของข้าพเจ้าสมบูรณ์
word.spanish1909: Dios es el que con virtud me corrobora, y el que despeja mi camino;
word.latinvulgate: Deus qui accinxit me fortitudine, et complanavit perfectam viam meam.
word.italian1927: Iddio è la mia potente fortezza, e rende la mia via perfetta.
word.german1912: Gott stärkt mich mit Kraft und weist mir einen Weg ohne Tadel.
word.french1910: C'est Dieu qui est ma puissante forteresse, Et qui me conduit dans la voie droite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這位　神是我堅固的避難所，他使我的道路完全。
word.korean: 하나님은 나의 견고한 요새시며 나를 온전한 곳으로 인도하시며
word.tagalog: Ang Dios ay aking matibay na katibayan: At pinapatnubayan niya ang sakdal sa kaniyang lakad.
word.maori: Ko te Atua toku pa kaha: ko ia hei arahi i te hunga tika i tona ara.
word.cebuano: Ang Dios maoy akong malig-ong kuta; Ug siya nagamando sa hingpit diha sa iyang dalan.
word.hebrew: לג האל מעוזי חיל  {ס}  ויתר תמים דרכו (דרכי)  {ר}
word.hebrewmodern: האל מעוזי חיל ויתר תמים דרכו׃
word.greekot: ὁ ἰσχυρὸς ὁ κραταιῶν με δυνάμει καὶ ἐξετίναξεν ἄμωμον τὴν ὁδόν μου

word.kjv: Let your heart therefore be perfect with the LORD our God, to walk in his statutes, and to keep his commandments, as at this day.
word.thailand: เพราะฉะนั้นขอให้จิตใจของท่านทั้งหลายบริสุทธิ์ต่อพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของเรา คือที่จะดำเนินอยู่ในกฎเกณฑ์ของพระองค์ และรักษาพระบัญญัติของพระองค์ ดังในเวลานี้"
word.spanish1909: Sea pues perfecto vuestro corazón para con Jehová nuestro Dios, andando en sus estatutos, y guardando sus mandamientos, como el día de hoy.
word.latinvulgate: Sit quoque cor nostrum perfectum cum Domino Deo nostro, ut ambulemus in decretis ejus, et custodiamus mandata ejus, sicut et hodie.
word.italian1927: Sia dunque il cuor vostro dato interamente all’Eterno, al nostro Dio, per seguire le sue leggi e osservare i suoi comandamenti come fate oggi!"
word.german1912: Und euer Herz sei rechtschaffen mit dem HERRN, unserm Gott, zu wandeln in seinen Sitten und zu halten seine Gebote, wie es heute geht.
word.french1910: Que votre coeur soit tout à l'Eternel, notre Dieu, comme il l'est aujourd'hui, pour suivre ses lois et pour observer ses commandements.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 所以你們的心要完全歸給耶和華我們的　神，遵行他的律例，謹守他的誡命，像今天一樣。”
word.korean: 그런즉 너희 마음을 우리 하나님 여호와와 화합하여 완전케 하여 오늘날과 같이 그 법도를 행하며 그 계명을 지킬지어다 !
word.tagalog: Kaya't maging sakdal nawa ang inyong puso sa Panginoon nating Dios, na magsilakad sa kaniyang mga palatuntunan, at ingatan ang kaniyang mga utos, gaya sa araw na ito.
word.maori: Na kia tapatahi o koutou ngakau ki a Ihowa ki to tatou Atua, kia haere i runga i ana tikanga, kia puritia ana whakahau, kia rite ki to tenei ra.
word.cebuano: Busa hingpita ang inyong kasingkasing uban kang Jehova nga atong Dios, sa paglakat sa iyang kabalaoran, ug sa pagbantay sa iyang kasugoan, maingon niining adlawa.
word.hebrew: סא והיה לבבכם שלם עם יהוה אלהינו ללכת בחקיו ולשמר מצותיו כיום הזה
word.hebrewmodern: והיה לבבכם שלם עם יהוה אלהינו ללכת בחקיו ולשמר מצותיו כיום הזה׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἔθυσεν ὁ βασιλεὺς σαλωμων τὰς θυσίας τῶν εἰρηνικῶν ἃς ἔθυσεν τῷ κυρίῳ βοῶν δύο καὶ εἴκοσι χιλιάδας καὶ προβάτων ἑκατὸν εἴκοσι χιλιάδας καὶ ἐνεκαίνισεν τὸν οἶκον κυρίου ὁ βασιλεὺς καὶ πάντες οἱ υἱοὶ ισραηλ

word.kjv: For it came to pass, when Solomon was old, that his wives turned away his heart after other gods: and his heart was not perfect with the LORD his God, as was the heart of David his father.
word.thailand: เพราะอยู่มาเมื่อซาโลมอนทรงพระชราแล้ว มเหสีของพระองค์ได้หันพระทัยของพระองค์ให้ไปตามพระอื่น และพระทัยของพระองค์หาได้บริสุทธิ์ต่อพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของพระองค์ ดังพระทัยของดาวิดราชบิดาของพระองค์ไม่
word.spanish1909: Y ya que Salomón era viejo, sus mujeres inclinaron su corazón tras dioses ajenos; y su corazón no era perfecto con Jehová su Dios, como el corazón de su padre David.
word.latinvulgate: Cumque jam esset senex, depravatum est cor ejus per mulieres, ut sequeretur deos alienos : nec erat cor ejus perfectum cum Domino Deo suo, sicut cor David patris ejus.
word.italian1927: cosicché, al tempo della vecchiaia di Salomone, le sue mogli gl’inclinarono il cuore verso altri dèi; e il cuore di lui non appartenne tutto quanto all’Eterno, al suo Dio, come avea fatto il cuore di Davide suo padre.
word.german1912: Und da er nun alt war, neigten seine Weiber sein Herz den fremden Göttern nach, daß sein Herz nicht ganz war mit dem HERRN, seinem Gott, wie das Herz seines Vaters David.
word.french1910: A l'époque de la vieillesse de Salomon, ses femmes inclinèrent son coeur vers d'autres dieux; et son coeur ne fut point tout entier à l'Eternel, son Dieu, comme l'avait été le coeur de David, son père.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 所羅門年老的時候，他的妃嬪誘惑他的心偏離了　神去隨從別的神。他的心不像他的父親大衛那樣完全歸於耶和華他的　神。
word.korean: 솔로몬의 나이 늙을 때에 왕비들이 그 마음을 돌이켜 다른 신들을 좇게 하였으므로 왕의 마음이 그 부친 다윗의 마음과 같지 아니하여 그 하나님 여호와 앞에 온전치 못하였으니
word.tagalog: Sapagka't nangyari, nang si Salomon ay matanda na, iniligaw ng kaniyang mga asawa ang kaniyang puso sa ibang mga dios: at ang kaniyang puso ay hindi naging sakdal sa Panginoon niyang Dios, na gaya ng puso ni David na kaniyang ama.
word.maori: Na, koroheke rawa ake a Horomona, kua whakaanga ketia tona ngakau e ana wahine, kua whai i nga atua ke; kihai hoki tona ngakau i tapatahi ki a Ihowa, ki tona Atua, kihai i rite ki te ngakau o Rawiri, o tona papa.
word.cebuano: Kay nahitabo, sa diha nga si Salomon natigulang na ang iyang mga asawa nakapaliso sa iyang kasingkasing sa pagpanunot sa laing mga dios; ug ang iyang kasingkasing wala mahingpit kang Jehova nga iyang Dios, ingon sa kasingkasing ni David nga iyang amahan.
word.hebrew: ד ויהי לעת זקנת שלמה נשיו הטו את לבבו אחרי אלהים אחרים ולא היה לבבו שלם עם יהוה אלהיו כלבב דויד אביו
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי לעת זקנת שלמה נשיו הטו את לבבו אחרי אלהים אחרים ולא היה לבבו שלם עם יהוה אלהיו כלבב דויד אביו׃
word.greekot: τότε ᾠκοδόμησεν σαλωμων ὑψηλὸν τῷ χαμως εἰδώλῳ μωαβ καὶ τῷ βασιλεῖ αὐτῶν εἰδώλῳ υἱῶν αμμων

word.kjv: And he walked in all the sins of his father, which he had done before him: and his heart was not perfect with the LORD his God, as the heart of David his father.
word.thailand: พระองค์ดำเนินตามการบาปทุกอย่างซึ่งราชบิดาของพระองค์ได้กระทำต่อพระพักตร์พระองค์ และพระทัยของพระองค์ก็ไม่บริสุทธิ์ต่อพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของพระองค์ ดังพระทัยของดาวิดบรรพบุรุษของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y anduvo en todos los pecados de su padre, que había éste hecho antes de él; y no fué su corazón perfecto con Jehová su Dios, como el corazón de David su padre.
word.latinvulgate: Ambulavitque in omnibus peccatis patris sui, quæ fecerat ante eum : nec erat cor ejus perfectum cum Domino Deo suo, sicut cor David patris ejus.
word.italian1927: Egli s’abbandonò a tutti i peccati che suo padre avea commessi prima di lui, e il suo cuore non fu tutto quanto per l’Eterno, l’Iddio suo, com’era stato il cuore di Davide suo padre.
word.german1912: Und er wandelte in allen Sünden seines Vaters, die er vor ihm getan hatte, und sein Herz war nicht rechtschaffen an dem HERRN, seinem Gott, wie das Herz seines Vaters David.
word.french1910: Il se livra à tous les péchés que son père avait commis avant lui; et son coeur ne fut point tout entier à l'Eternel, son Dieu, comme l'avait été le coeur de David, son père.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 亞比央行他父親在他以前所行的一切罪惡。他的心不完完全全歸向耶和華他的　神，像他先祖大衛的心一樣。
word.korean: 아비얌이 그 부친의 이미 행한 모든 죄를 행하고 그 마음이 그 조상 다윗의 마음 같지 아니하여 그 하나님 여호와 앞에 온전치 못하였으나
word.tagalog: At siya'y lumakad sa lahat ng mga kasalanan ng kaniyang ama na ginawa nito na una sa kaniya: at ang kaniyang puso ay hindi sakdal sa Panginoon niyang Dios, na gaya ng puso ni David na kaniyang magulang.
word.maori: Na i haere ia i runga i nga hara katoa i mea ai tona papa i mua atu i a ia: kihai hoki tona ngakau i tapatahi ki a Ihowa, ki tona Atua, kihai i rite ki te ngakau o tona tupuna, o Rawiri.
word.cebuano: Ug siya naglakat sa tanang sala sa iyang amahan nga iyang nabuhat nga una kaniya; ug ang iyang kasingkasing dili hingpit kang Jehova nga iyang Dios, ingon sa kasingkasing ni David nga iyang amahan.
word.hebrew: ג וילך בכל חטאות אביו אשר עשה לפניו ולא היה לבבו שלם עם יהוה אלהיו כלבב דוד אביו
word.hebrewmodern: וילך בכל חטאות אביו אשר עשה לפניו ולא היה לבבו שלם עם יהוה אלהיו כלבב דוד אביו׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπορεύθη ἐν ταῖς ἁμαρτίαις τοῦ πατρὸς αὐτοῦ αἷς ἐποίησεν ἐνώπιον αὐτοῦ καὶ οὐκ ἦν ἡ καρδία αὐτοῦ τελεία μετὰ κυρίου θεοῦ αὐτοῦ ὡς ἡ καρδία δαυιδ τοῦ πατρὸς αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: But the high places were not removed: nevertheless Asa's heart was perfect with the LORD all his days.
word.thailand: แต่มิได้ทรงรื้อปูชนียสถานสูงเหล่านั้น ถึงอย่างนั้นพระทัยของอาสาก็บริสุทธิ์ต่อพระเยโฮวาห์ตลอดรัชสมัยของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Empero los altos no se quitaron: con todo, el corazón de Asa fué perfecto para con Jehová toda su vida.
word.latinvulgate: excelsa autem non abstulit. Verumtamen cor Asa perfectum erat cum Domino cunctis diebus suis :
word.italian1927: Nondimeno, gli alti luoghi non furono eliminati; quantunque il cuore d’Asa fosse tutto quanto per l’Eterno, durante l’intera sua vita.
word.german1912: Aber die Höhen taten sie nicht ab. Doch war das Herz Asas rechtschaffen an dem HERRN sein Leben lang.
word.french1910: Mais les hauts lieux ne disparurent point, quoique le coeur d'Asa fût en entier à l'Eternel pendant toute sa vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 只是邱壇還沒有廢去；不過亞撒一生都完完全全歸向耶和華。
word.korean: 오직 산당은 없이하지 아니하니라 그러나 아사의 마음이 일평생 여호와 앞에 온전하였으며
word.tagalog: Nguni't ang matataas na dako ay hindi inalis: gayon ma'y ang puso ni Asa ay sakdal sa Panginoon sa lahat ng kaniyang kaarawan.
word.maori: Otiia kihai i whakakorea nga wahi tiketike. He ahakoa ra, i tapatahi te ngakau o Aha ki a Ihowa i ona ra katoa.
word.cebuano: Apan ang mga dapit nga hatag-as wala panguhaa: walay sapayan ang kasingkasing ni Asa hingpit uban kang Jehova sa tanan niyang mga adlaw.
word.hebrew: יד והבמות לא סרו רק לבב אסא היה שלם עם יהוה--כל ימיו  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: והבמות לא סרו רק לבב אסא היה שלם עם יהוה כל ימיו׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἰσήνεγκεν τοὺς κίονας τοῦ πατρὸς αὐτοῦ καὶ τοὺς κίονας αὐτοῦ εἰσήνεγκεν εἰς τὸν οἶκον κυρίου ἀργυροῦς καὶ χρυσοῦς καὶ σκεύη

word.kjv: I beseech thee, O LORD, remember now how I have walked before thee in truth and with a perfect heart, and have done that which is good in thy sight. And Hezekiah wept sore.
word.thailand: "ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ข้าพระองค์ขอวิงวอนต่อพระองค์ ขอทรงระลึกว่า ข้าพระองค์ดำเนินอยู่ต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระองค์ด้วยความจริงและด้วยใจที่เพียบพร้อม และได้กระทำสิ่งที่ประเสริฐในสายพระเนตรของพระองค์มาอย่างไร" และเฮเซคียาห์ทรงกันแสงอย่างปวดร้าว
word.spanish1909: Ruégote, oh Jehová, ruégote hagas memoria de que he andado delante de ti en verdad é íntegro corazón, y que he hecho las cosas que te agradan. Y lloró Ezechîas con gran lloro.
word.latinvulgate: Obsecro, Domine : memento, quæso, quomodo ambulaverim coram te in veritate, et in corde perfecto, et quod placitum est coram te fecerim. Flevit itaque Ezechias fletu magno.
word.italian1927: "O Eterno, te ne supplico, ricordati come io ho camminato nel tuo cospetto con fedeltà e con integrità di cuore, e come ho fatto ciò ch’è bene agli occhi tuoi". Ed Ezechia dette in un gran pianto.
word.german1912: Ach, HERR, gedenke doch, daß ich vor dir treulich gewandelt habe und mit rechtschaffenem Herzen und habe getan, was dir wohl gefällt. Und Hiskia weinte sehr.
word.french1910: O Eternel! souviens-toi que j'ai marché devant ta face avec fidélité et intégrité de coeur, et que j'ai fait ce qui est bien à tes yeux! Et Ezéchias répandit d'abondantes larmes.
word.chinesencvtraditional: “唉，耶和華啊！求你記念我曾怎樣以真誠和完全的心在你面前行事為人，我所行的都是你看為善的事。”希西家就痛哭起來。
word.korean: 여호와여 구하오니 내가 진실과 전심으로 주 앞에 행하며 주의 보시기에 선하게 행한 것을 기억하옵소서 하고 심히 통곡하더라
word.tagalog: Idinadalangin ko sa iyo, Oh Panginoon, na iyong alalahanin, kung paanong ako'y lumakad sa harap mo sa katotohanan, at may dalisay na puso at gumawa ng mabuti sa iyong paningin. At si Ezechias ay umiyak na mainam.
word.maori: Tena ra, e Ihowa, kia mahara ki oku haereerenga i tou aroaro i runga i te pono, i te ngakau tapatahi, ki taku meatanga i te pai ki tau titiro. Na tangi ana a Hetekia, nui atu te tangi.
word.cebuano: Hinumdumi karon, Oh Jehova, ako nagapakilooy kanimo, giunsa ko ang paglakaw sa atubangan nimo sa kamatuoran, ug sa usa ka hingpit nga kasingkasing, ug gibuhat ko kadtong maayo sa imong panan-aw. Ug mihilak si Ezechias sa hilabihan.
word.hebrew: ג אנה יהוה זכר נא את אשר התהלכתי לפניך באמת ובלבב שלם והטוב בעיניך עשיתי ויבך חזקיהו בכי גדול  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: אנה יהוה זכר נא את אשר התהלכתי לפניך באמת ובלבב שלם והטוב בעיניך עשיתי ויבך חזקיהו בכי גדול׃
word.greekot: ὦ δή κύριε μνήσθητι δὴ ὅσα περιεπάτησα ἐνώπιόν σου ἐν ἀληθείᾳ καὶ ἐν καρδίᾳ πλήρει καὶ τὸ ἀγαθὸν ἐν ὀφθαλμοῖς σου ἐποίησα καὶ ἔκλαυσεν εζεκιας κλαυθμῷ μεγάλῳ

word.kjv: All these men of war, that could keep rank, came with a perfect heart to Hebron, to make David king over all Israel: and all the rest also of Israel were of one heart to make David king.
word.thailand: ทหารทั้งสิ้นเหล่านี้ พร้อมที่จะทำศึก ได้มายังเฮโบรน ด้วยเจตนาเต็มเปี่ยมที่จะเชิญดาวิดเป็นกษัตริย์เหนืออิสราเอลทั้งสิ้น ในทำนองเดียวกันบรรดาคนอิสราเอลที่เหลืออยู่ ก็เป็นใจเดียวกันที่จะเชิญดาวิดเป็นกษัตริย์
word.spanish1909: Todos estos hombres de guerra, dispuestos para guerrear, vinieron con corazón perfecto á Hebrón, para poner á David por rey sobre todo Israel; asimismo todos los demás de Israel estaban de un mismo ánimo para poner á David por rey.
word.latinvulgate: Omnes isti viri bellatores expediti ad pugnandum, corde perfecto venerunt in Hebron, ut constituerent regem David super universum Israël : sed et omnes reliqui ex Israël, uno corde erant, ut rex fieret David.
word.italian1927: Tutti questi uomini, gente di guerra, pronti a ordinarsi in battaglia, giunsero a Hebron, con sincerità di cuore, per proclamare Davide re sopra tutto Israele; e anche tutto il rimanente d’Israele era unanime per fare re Davide.
word.german1912: Alle diese Kriegsleute, die das Heer ordneten, kamen von ganzem Herzen gen Hebron, David zum König zu machen über ganz Israel. Auch war alles andere Israel eines Herzens, daß man David zum König machte.
word.french1910: Tous ces hommes, gens de guerre, prêts à combattre, arrivèrent à Hébron en sincérité de coeur pour établir David roi sur tout Israël. Et tout le reste d'Israël était également unanime pour faire régner David.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以上這些戰士，行軍齊整，一心一意來到希伯崙，要立大衛作以色列王；其餘的以色列人也都一心一意要立大衛為王。
word.korean: 이 모든 군사가 항오를 정제히 하고 다 성심으로 헤브론에 이르러 다윗으로 온 이스라엘 왕을 삼고자 하고 또 이스라엘의 남은 자도 다 일심으로 다윗으로 왕을 삼고자 하여
word.tagalog: Lahat ng mga ito na mga lalaking mangdidigma na makahahanay sa pagbabaka, ay nagsiparoong may sakdal na puso sa Hebron, upang gawing hari si David sa buong Israel: at ang lahat na nangalabi sa Israel ay nagkaisang loob din naman upang gawing hari si David.
word.maori: Ko enei, he tangata whawhai katoa, he mohio ki te tatau, he tapatahi tonu te ngakau i haere ai ki Heperona ki te mea i a Rawiri hei kingi mo Iharaira katoa. Na, ko era atu katoa o Iharaira, kotahi tonu te ngakau mo te whakakingi i a Rawiri.
word.cebuano: Kining tanan sanglit mga tawo sa gubat, nga makapahaluna sa gubat, nangadto uban ang usa ka hingpit nga kasingkasing ngadto sa Hebron, sa paghimo kang David nga hari sa ibabaw sa tibook Israel: ug ang tanan usab sa Israel nanaghiusa sa kasingkasing sa paghimo kang David nga hari.
word.hebrew: לח ומעבר לירדן מן הראובני והגדי וחצי שבט מנשה בכל כלי צבא מלחמה--מאה ועשרים אלף  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: כל אלה אנשי מלחמה עדרי מערכה בלבב שלם באו חברונה להמליך את דויד על כל ישראל וגם כל שרית ישראל לב אחד להמליך את דויד׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐκ πέραν τοῦ ιορδάνου ἀπὸ ρουβην καὶ γαδδι καὶ ἀπὸ τοῦ ἡμίσους φυλῆς μανασση ἐν πᾶσιν σκεύεσιν πολεμικοῖς ἑκατὸν εἴκοσι χιλιάδες

word.kjv: And thou, Solomon my son, know thou the God of thy father, and serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind: for the LORD searcheth all hearts, and understandeth all the imaginations of the thoughts: if thou seek him, he will be found of thee; but if thou forsake him, he will cast thee off for ever.
word.thailand: ซาโลมอนบุตรของเราเอ๋ย เจ้าจงรู้จักพระเจ้าของบิดาเจ้า และจงปรนนิบัติพระองค์ด้วยใจจริงและด้วยความเต็มใจของเจ้า เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงพิจารณาจิตใจทั้งปวง และทรงเข้าใจในแผนงานแห่งความคิดทั้งปวง ถ้าเจ้าแสวงหาพระองค์ เจ้าจะพบพระองค์ แต่ถ้าเจ้าทอดทิ้งพระองค์ พระองค์จะทรงเหวี่ยงเจ้าออกไปเสียเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Y tú, Salomón, hijo mío, conoce al Dios de tu padre, y sírvele con corazón perfecto, y con ánimo voluntario; porque Jehová escudriña los corazones de todos, y entiende toda imaginación de los pensamientos. Si tú le buscares, lo hallarás; mas si lo dejares
word.latinvulgate: Tu autem, Salomon fili mi, scito Deum patris tui, et servito ei corde perfecto, animo voluntario : omnia enim corda scrutatur Dominus, et universas mentium cogitationes intelligit. Si quæsieris eum, invenies : si autem dereliqueris eum, projiciet te in æternum.
word.italian1927: E tu, Salomone, figliuol mio, riconosci l’Iddio di tuo padre, e servilo con cuore integro e con animo volenteroso; poiché l’Eterno scruta tutti i cuori, e penetra tutti i disegni e tutti i pensieri. Se tu lo cerchi, egli si lascerà trovare da te; ma, se lo abbandoni, egli ti rigetterà in perpetuo.
word.german1912: Und du, mein Sohn Salomo, erkenne den Gott deines Vaters und diene ihm mit ganzem Herzen und mit williger Seele. Denn der HERR sucht alle Herzen und versteht aller Gedanken Dichten. Wirst du ihn suchen, so wirst du ihn finden; wirst du ihn aber verlassen, so wird er dich verwerfen ewiglich.
word.french1910: Et toi, Salomon, mon fils, connais le Dieu de ton père, et sers-le d'un coeur dévoué et d'une âme bien disposée, car l'Eternel sonde tous les coeurs et pénètre tous les desseins et toutes les pensées. Si tu le cherches, il se laissera trouver par toi; mais si tu l'abandonnes, il te rejettera pour toujours.
word.chinesencvtraditional: “至於你，我兒所羅門哪，你要認識耶和華你父親的　神，一心樂意事奉他，因為耶和華鑒察萬人的心，知道人的一切心思意念。你若是尋求他，就必尋見；你若是離棄他，他必永遠丟棄你。
word.korean: 내 아들 솔로몬아 너는 네 아비의 하나님을 알고 온전한 마음과 기쁜 뜻으로 섬길지어다 여호와께서는 뭇 마음을 감찰하사 모든 사상을 아시나니 네가 저를 찾으면 만날 것이요 버리면 저가 너를 영원히 버리시리라
word.tagalog: At ikaw, Salomon na aking anak, kilalanin mo ang Dios ng iyong ama, at paglingkuran mo siya ng sakdal na puso at ng kusang pagiisip: sapagka't sinasaliksik ng Panginoon ang lahat na puso, at naaalaman ang lahat na akala ng pagiisip: kung iyong hanapin siya, ay masusumpungan siya sa iyo; nguni't kung pabayaan mo siya, kaniyang itatakwil ka magpakailan man.
word.maori: Me koe hoki, e taku tama, e Horomona, kia mohio koe ki te Atua o tou papa, kia tapatahi hoki te ngakau, kia hihiko te wairua e mahi ai koe ki a ia; e rapua ana hoki e Ihowa nga mea o nga ngakau katoa, a e mohiotia katoatia ana e ia nga tokonga ak e o nga whakaaro. Ki te rapua ia e koe, ka kitea, a ki te whakarerea ia e koe, ka peia koe e ia a ake ake.
word.cebuano: Ug ikaw, Salomon akong anak nga lalake, ilhon mo ang Dios sa imong amahan, ug alagara siya uban ang usa ka hingpit nga kasingkasing ug usa ka masinugtanon nga salabutan; kay si Jehova nagasusi sa tanang mga kasingkasing, ug nakasabut sa tanang mga tinukod sa mga hunahuna. Kong pangitaon mo siya, hikaplagan mo siya; apan kong biyaan mo siya isalikway ikaw niya sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: ט ואתה שלמה בני דע את אלהי אביך ועבדהו בלב שלם ובנפש חפצה--כי כל לבבות דורש יהוה וכל יצר מחשבות מבין  אם תדרשנו ימצא לך ואם תעזבנו יזניחך לעד
word.hebrewmodern: ואתה שלמה בני דע את אלהי אביך ועבדהו בלב שלם ובנפש חפצה כי כל לבבות דורש יהוה וכל יצר מחשבות מבין אם תדרשנו ימצא לך ואם תעזבנו יזניחך לעד׃
word.greekot: καὶ νῦν σαλωμων υἱέ μου γνῶθι τὸν θεὸν τῶν πατέρων σου καὶ δούλευε αὐτῷ ἐν καρδίᾳ τελείᾳ καὶ ψυχῇ θελούσῃ ὅτι πάσας καρδίας ἐτάζει κύριος καὶ πᾶν ἐνθύμημα γιγνώσκει ἐὰν ζητήσῃς αὐτόν εὑρεθήσεταί σοι καὶ ἐὰν καταλείψῃς αὐτόν καταλείψει σε εἰς τέλος

word.kjv: Then the people rejoiced, for that they offered willingly, because with perfect heart they offered willingly to the LORD: and David the king also rejoiced with great joy.
word.thailand: แล้วประชาชนก็เปรมปรีดิ์ เพราะเขาถวายสิ่งเหล่านี้ตามความสมัครใจของเขา เพราะเขาถวายด้วยความจริงใจและความเต็มใจแด่พระเยโฮวาห์ กษัตริย์ดาวิดก็ทรงเปรมปรีดิ์เป็นที่ยิ่งด้วย
word.spanish1909: Y holgóse el pueblo de haber contribuído de su voluntad; porque con entero corazón ofrecieron á Jehová voluntariamente.
word.latinvulgate: Lætatusque est populus, cum vota sponte promitterent : quia corde toto offerebant ea Domino : sed et David rex lætatus est gaudio magno.
word.italian1927: Il popolo si rallegrò di quelle loro offerte volontarie, perché avean fatte quelle offerte all’Eterno con tutto il cuore; e anche il re Davide se ne rallegrò grandemente.
word.german1912: Und das Volk ward fröhlich, daß sie willig waren; denn sie gaben's von ganzem Herzen dem HERRN freiwillig. Und David, der König, freute sich auch hoch
word.french1910: Le peuple se réjouit de leurs offrandes volontaires, car c'était avec un coeur bien disposé qu'ils les faisaient à l'Eternel; et le roi David en eut aussi une grande joie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 人民因這些人自願奉獻而歡喜，因為他們一心樂意奉獻給耶和華，大衛王也非常歡喜。
word.korean: 백성이 자기의 즐거이 드림으로 기뻐하였으니 곧 저희가 성심으로 여호와께 즐거이 드림이며 다윗 왕도 기쁨을 이기지 못하여 하니라
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y nagalak ang bayan, dahil sa sila'y nangaghandog na kusa, sapagka't sila'y may dalisay na puso na nangaghandog na kusa sa Panginoon: at si David naman na hari ay nagalak ng dakilang pagkagalak.
word.maori: Na ka koa te iwi, i a ratou i hihiko nei ki te tapae noa; he tapatahi hoki te ngakau i hihiko ai ratou ki ta Ihowa, mahi: nui atu hoki te koa i koa ai a Kingi Rawiri.
word.cebuano: Unya ang katawohan nangalipay tungod niana sila nanghatag sa kinabubut-on, tungod kay uban sa usa ka hingpit nga kasingkasing sila nanghatag kang Jehova sa kinabubut-on: ug si David nga hari nalipay usab sa usa ka dakung kalipay.
word.hebrew: ט וישמחו העם על התנדבם כי בלב שלם התנדבו ליהוה וגם דויד המלך שמח שמחה גדולה  {פ}
word.hebrewmodern: וישמחו העם על התנדבם כי בלב שלם התנדבו ליהוה וגם דויד המלך שמח שמחה גדולה׃
word.greekot: καὶ εὐφράνθη ὁ λαὸς ὑπὲρ τοῦ προθυμηθῆναι ὅτι ἐν καρδίᾳ πλήρει προεθυμήθησαν τῷ κυρίῳ καὶ δαυιδ ὁ βασιλεὺς εὐφράνθη μεγάλως

word.kjv: And give unto Solomon my son a perfect heart, to keep thy commandments, thy testimonies, and thy statutes, and to do all these things, and to build the palace, for the which I have made provision.
word.thailand: ขอพระองค์ทรงโปรดซาโลมอนบุตรชายของข้าพระองค์ให้มีจิตใจจริงที่จะรักษาบรรดาพระบัญญัติของพระองค์ พระโอวาทของพระองค์ และกฎเกณฑ์ของพระองค์ และให้กระทำทุกอย่างเหล่านี้ และสร้างนิเวศตามซึ่งข้าพระองค์ได้ตระเตรียมไว้แล้วนั้น"
word.spanish1909: Asimismo da á mi hijo Salomón corazón perfecto, para que guarde tus mandamientos, y tus testimonios y tus estatutos, y para que haga todas las cosas, y te edifique la casa para la cual yo he hecho el apresto.
word.latinvulgate: Salomoni quoque filio meo da cor perfectum, ut custodiat mandata tua, testimonia tua, et cæremonias tuas, et faciat universa : et ædificet ædem, cujus impensas paravi.
word.italian1927: e da’ a Salomone, mio figliuolo, un cuore integro, affinch’egli osservi i tuoi comandamenti, i tuoi precetti e le tue leggi, affinché eseguisca tutti questi miei piani, e costruisca il palazzo, per il quale ho fatto i preparativi".
word.german1912: Und meinem Sohn Salomo gib ein rechtschaffenes Herz, daß er halte deine Gebote, Zeugnisse und Rechte, daß er alles tue und baue diese Wohnung, die ich zugerichtet habe.
word.french1910: Donne à mon fils Salomon un coeur dévoué à l'observation de tes commandements, de tes préceptes et de tes lois, afin qu'il mette en pratique toutes ces choses, et qu'il bâtisse le palais pour lequel j'ai fait des préparatifs.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你賜給我的兒子所羅門專一的心，謹守你的誡命、法度和律例，作成這一切事，用我所預備的一切來建造殿宇。”
word.korean: 또 내 아들 솔로몬에게 정성된 마음을 주사 주의 계명과 법도와 율례를 지켜 이 모든 일을 행하게 하시고 내가 위하여 예비한 것으로 전을 건축하게 하옵소서
word.tagalog: At bigyan mo naman si Salomon na aking anak ng sakdal na puso, upang ingatan ang iyong mga utos, ang iyong mga patotoo, at ang iyong mga palatuntunan, at upang gawin ang lahat na bagay na ito, at upang itayo ang templo, na siyang aking ipinaghanda.
word.maori: Ki taku tama hoki, ki a Horomona, homai he ngakau tapatahi, kia puritia ai e ia au whakahau, au whakaaturanga, au tikanga, kia oti katoa i a ia; kia hanga hoki te whare, mo reira nei nga mea kua pae nei i ahau.
word.cebuano: Ug si Salomon nga akong anak nga lalake hatagi ug usa ka kasingkasing nga hingpit, aron sa pagbantay sa imong mga sugo, sa imong mga pagpamatuod, ug sa imong kabalaoran, ug sa pagbuhat niining tanang mga butanga, ug sa pagtukod sa puloy-anan, nga alang niana ako nagaandam.
word.hebrew: יט ולשלמה בני תן לבב שלם לשמור מצותיך עדותיך וחקיך ולעשות הכל ולבנות הבירה אשר הכינותי  {פ}
word.hebrewmodern: ולשלמה בני תן לבב שלם לשמור מצותיך עדותיך וחקיך ולעשות הכל ולבנות הבירה אשר הכינותי׃
word.greekot: καὶ σαλωμων τῷ υἱῷ μου δὸς καρδίαν ἀγαθὴν ποιεῖν τὰς ἐντολάς σου καὶ τὰ μαρτύριά σου καὶ τὰ προστάγματά σου καὶ τοῦ ἐπὶ τέλος ἀγαγεῖν τὴν κατασκευὴν τοῦ οἴκου σου

word.kjv: And the flowers, and the lamps, and the tongs, made he of gold, and that perfect gold;
word.thailand: ดอกไม้ ตะเกียง และตะไกรตัดไส้ตะเกียง ทำด้วยทองคำ คือทองคำบริสุทธิ์ที่สุด
word.spanish1909: Y las flores, y las lamparillas, y las despabiladeras se hicieron de oro, de oro perfecto;
word.latinvulgate: et florentia quædam, et lucernas, et forcipes aureos : omnia de auro mundissimo facta sunt.
word.italian1927: i fiori, le lampade, gli smoccolatoi, d’oro del più puro;
word.german1912: und die Blumen und die Lampen und die Schneuzen waren golden, das war alles völliges Gold;
word.french1910: les fleurs, les lampes et les mouchettes d'or, d'or très pur;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 還有燈花、燈盞和燭剪，都是精金做的。
word.korean: 또 순정한 금으로 만든 꽃과 등잔과 화젓가락이며
word.tagalog: At ang mga bulaklak, at ang mga ilawan at ang mga gunting, na ginto, at yao'y dalisay na ginto;
word.maori: Ko nga puawai, ko nga rama, ko nga kokopi, he mea koura, he koura pai rawa;
word.cebuano: Ug ang mga bulak, ug ang mga lamparahan, ug ang mga kompit, mga bulawan, ug kana sa lunsay nga bulawan;
word.hebrew: כא והפרח והנרות והמלקחים זהב הוא מכלות זהב
word.hebrewmodern: והפרח והנרות והמלקחים זהב הוא מכלות זהב׃
word.greekot: καὶ λαβίδες αὐτῶν καὶ οἱ λύχνοι αὐτῶν καὶ τὰς φιάλας καὶ τὰς θυΐσκας καὶ τὰ πυρεῖα χρυσίου καθαροῦ

word.kjv: Now all the work of Solomon was prepared unto the day of the foundation of the house of the LORD, and until it was finished. So the house of the LORD was perfected.
word.thailand: บรรดาพระราชกิจของซาโลมอนก็ลุล่วงไปตั้งแต่วันที่วางรากพระนิเวศของพระเยโฮวาห์จนถึงวันสำเร็จงาน ดังนั้นพระนิเวศของพระเยโฮวาห์ก็สำเร็จครบถ้วน
word.spanish1909: Porque toda la obra de Salomón estaba preparada desde el día en que la casa de Jehová fué fundada hasta que se acabó, hasta que la casa de Jehová fué acabada del todo.
word.latinvulgate: Omnes impensas præparatas habuit Salomon ex eo die, quo fundavit domum Domini usque in diem, quo perfecit eam.
word.italian1927: Così fu condotta tutta l’opera di Salomone dal giorno in cui fu fondata la casa dell’Eterno, fino a quando fu terminata. La casa dell’Eterno ebbe il suo perfetto compimento.
word.german1912: Also ward bereitet alles Geschäft Salomos von dem Tage an, da des HERRN Haus gegründet ward, bis er's vollendete, daß des HERRN Haus ganz bereitet ward.
word.french1910: Ainsi fut dirigée toute l'oeuvre de Salomon, jusqu'au jour où la maison de l'Eternel fut fondée et jusqu'à celui où elle fut terminée. La maison de l'Eternel fut donc achevée.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 從耶和華的殿奠基的日子起，直到建成，所羅門的一切工程都進行順利。這樣，耶和華的殿就完成了。
word.korean: 솔로몬이 여호와의 전의 기지를 쌓던 날부터 준공하기까지 범백을 완비하였으므로 여호와의 전이 결점이 없이 필역하니라
word.tagalog: Ang lahat ngang gawain ni Salomon ay nahanda sa araw ng pagtatayo ng bahay ng Panginoon, at hanggang sa natapos. Sa gayo'y nayari ang bahay ng Panginoon.
word.maori: Na kua rite te mahi katoa a Horomona tae rawa ake te ra i tu ai te whare o Ihowa, taea noatia tona otinga. Na kua tino oti te whare o Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Karon ang tanang bulohaton ni Salomon naandam alang sa adlaw sa pagtukod sa balay ni Jehova, ug hangtud nga kini natapus. Busa ang balay ni Jehova nahuman.
word.hebrew: טז ותכן כל מלאכת שלמה עד היום מוסד בית יהוה ועד כלתו  שלם בית יהוה  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: ותכן כל מלאכת שלמה עד היום מוסד בית יהוה ועד כלתו שלם בית יהוה׃

word.kjv: But the high places were not taken away out of Israel: nevertheless the heart of Asa was perfect all his days.
word.thailand: แต่ยังมิได้กำจัดปูชนียสถานสูงออกเสียจากอิสราเอล อย่างไรก็ดีพระทัยของอาสาก็บริสุทธิ์ตลอดรัชสมัยของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Mas con todo eso los altos no eran quitados de Israel, aunque el corazón de Asa fué perfecto mientras vivió.
word.latinvulgate: Excelsa autem derelicta sunt in Israël : attamen cor Asa erat perfectum cunctis diebus ejus,
word.italian1927: Nondimeno, gli alti luoghi non furono eliminati da Israele; quantunque il cuore d’Asa fosse integro, durante l’intera sua vita.
word.german1912: Aber die Höhen in Israel wurden nicht abgetan; doch war das Herz Asas rechtschaffen sein Leben lang.
word.french1910: Mais les hauts lieux ne disparurent point d'Israël, quoique le coeur d'Asa fût en entier à l'Eternel pendant toute sa vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 只是邱壇還沒有從以色列中除掉，但亞撒的心一生都完全忠於耶和華。
word.korean: 산당은 이스라엘 중에서 제하지 아니하였으나 아사의 마음이 일평생 온전하였더라
word.tagalog: Nguni't ang mga mataas na dako ay hindi inalis sa Israel: gayon ma'y ang puso ni Asa ay sakdal sa lahat ng kaniyang mga kaarawan.
word.maori: Otiia kihai i whakakorea nga wahi tiketike i roto i a Iharaira. He ahakoa ra, i tapatahi te ngakau o Aha i ona ra katoa.
word.cebuano: Apan ang mga hatag-as nga dapit wala panguhaa gikan sa Israel: apan bisan pa niana ang kasingkasing ni Asa hingpit sa tanan niyang mga adlaw.

word.kjv: For the eyes of the LORD run to and fro throughout the whole earth, to shew himself strong in the behalf of them whose heart is perfect toward him. Herein thou hast done foolishly: therefore from henceforth thou shalt have wars.
word.thailand: เพราะว่าพระเนตรของพระเยโฮวาห์ไปมาอยู่เหนือแผ่นดินโลกทั้งสิ้น เพื่อสำแดงฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์โดยเห็นแก่ผู้เหล่านั้นที่มีใจจริงต่อพระองค์ ในเรื่องนี้ท่านได้กระทำการอย่างโง่เขลา เพราะตั้งแต่นี้ไปท่านจะมีการศึกสงคราม"
word.spanish1909: Porque los ojos de Jehová contemplan toda la tierra, para corroborar á los que tienen corazón perfecto para con él. Locamente has hecho en esto; porque de aquí adelante habrá guerra contra ti.
word.latinvulgate: Oculi enim Domini contemplantur universam terram, et præbent fortitudinem his, qui corde perfecto credunt in eum. Stulte igitur egisti, et propter hoc ex præsenti tempore adversum te bella consurgent.
word.italian1927: Poiché l’Eterno scorre collo sguardo tutta la terra per spiegar la sua forza a pro di quelli che hanno il cuore integro verso di lui. In questo tu hai agito da insensato; poiché, da ora innanzi, avrai delle guerre".
word.german1912: Denn des HERRN Augen schauen alle Lande, daß er stärke die, so von ganzem Herzen an ihm sind. Du hast töricht getan; darum wirst du auch von nun an Kriege haben. {~}
word.french1910: Car l'Eternel étend ses regards sur toute la terre, pour soutenir ceux dont le coeur est tout entier à lui. Tu as agi en insensé dans cette affaire, car dès à présent tu auras des guerres.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的眼目遍察全地，一心歸向他的，他必以大能扶助他們；你作這事太愚昧了。從今以後，你必常有戰爭。”
word.korean: 여호와의 눈은 온 땅을 두루 감찰하사 전심으로 자기에게 향하는 자를 위하여 능력을 베푸시나니 이 일은 왕이 망령되이 행하였은즉 이후부터는 왕에게 전쟁이 있으리이다' 하매
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang mga mata ng Panginoon ay nagsisiyasat sa palibot ng buong lupa, upang pakilala na matibay sa ikagagaling ng mga yaon na ang puso ay sakdal sa kaniya. Ikaw ay gumawang may kamangmangan; sapagka't mula ngayo'y magkakaroon ka ng mga pakikipagdigma.
word.maori: E kopikopiko ana hoki nga kanohi o Ihowa i te whenua katoa, hei whakaatu i te kaha o tana awhina i te hunga e tapatahi ana o ratou ngakau ki a ia. He mahi kuware tenei nau; na ka whai pakanga koe i nga wa e takoto ake nei.
word.cebuano: Kay ang mga mata ni Jehova nagadalagan ngadto-nganhi sa tibook yuta, aron sa pagpakita sa iyang kaugalingon nga makusganon alang kanila nga may kasingkasing nga hingpit alang kaniya. Dinhi niini ikaw naghimo ug binuang; busa kutob karon ikaw may mga gubat.
word.hebrew: ט כי יהוה עיניו משטטות בכל הארץ להתחזק עם לבבם שלם אליו--נסכלת על זאת  כי מעתה יש עמך מלחמות

word.kjv: And he charged them, saying, Thus shall ye do in the fear of the LORD, faithfully, and with a perfect heart.

word.spanish1909: Y mandóles, diciendo: Procederéis asimismo con temor de Jehová, con verdad, y con corazón íntegro.

word.italian1927: E diede loro i suoi ordini, dicendo: "Voi farete così, con timore dell’Eterno, con fedeltà e con cuore integro:
word.german1912: und er gebot ihnen und sprach: Tut also in der Furcht des HERRN, treulich und mit rechtem Herzen.
word.french1910: Et voici les ordres qu'il leur donna: Vous agirez de la manière suivante dans la crainte de l'Eternel, avec fidélité et avec intégrité de coeur.

word.kjv: So the workmen wrought, and the work was perfected by them, and they set the house of God in his state, and strengthened it.

word.kjv: There was a man in the land of Uz, whose name was Job; and that man was perfect and upright, and one that feared God, and eschewed evil.
word.thailand: มีชายคนหนึ่งในแผ่นดินอูส ชื่อโยบ ชายคนนั้นเป็นคนดีรอบคอบและเที่ยงธรรม เป็นผู้เกรงกลัวพระเจ้าและหันเสียจากความชั่วร้าย
word.spanish1909: HUBO un varón en tierra de Hus, llamado Job; y era este hombre perfecto y recto, y temeroso de Dios, y apartado del mal.
word.latinvulgate: Vir erat in terra Hus, nomine Job ; et erat vir ille simplex, et rectus, ac timens Deum, et recedens a malo.
word.italian1927: C’era nel paese di Uz un uomo che si chiamava Giobbe. Quest’uomo era integro e retto; temeva Iddio e fuggiva il male.
word.german1912: Es war ein Mann im Lande Uz, der hieß Hiob. Derselbe war schlecht und recht, gottesfürchtig und mied das Böse.
word.french1910: Il y avait dans le pays d'Uts un homme qui s'appelait Job. Et cet homme était intègre et droit; il craignait Dieu, et se détournait du mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 約伯的德行與財富烏斯地有一個人，名叫約伯。這人完全、正直，敬畏　神，遠離罪惡。
word.korean: 우스 땅에 욥이라 이름하는 사람이 있었는데 그 사람은 순전하고 정직하여 하나님을 경외하며 악에서 떠난 자더라
word.tagalog: May isang lalake sa lupain ng Uz, na ang pangalan ay Job; at ang lalaking yaon ay sakdal at matuwid, at natatakot sa Dios, at humihiwalay sa kasamaan.
word.maori: ¶ Tera tetahi tangata i te whenua o Uhu, ko Hopa tona ingoa; a ko taua tangata he tangata tapatahi, he tika, he tangata wehi ki te Atua, mawehe i te kino.
word.cebuano: Dinhay usa ka tawo sa yuta sa Hus, kinsang ngalan mao si Job; ug kadtong tawohana hingpit ug matarung, ug usa nga mahadlokon sa Dios, ug nagapahilayo sa dautan.
word.hebrew: א איש היה בארץ עוץ איוב שמו והיה האיש ההוא תם וישר וירא אלהים--וסר מרע

word.greekot: ἄνθρωπός τις ἦν ἐν χώρᾳ τῇ αυσίτιδι ᾧ ὄνομα ιωβ καὶ ἦν ὁ ἄνθρωπος ἐκεῖνος ἀληθινός ἄμεμπτος δίκαιος θεοσεβής ἀπεχόμενος ἀπὸ παντὸς πονηροῦ πράγματος

word.kjv: And the LORD said unto Satan, Hast thou considered my servant Job, that there is none like him in the earth, a perfect and an upright man, one that feareth God, and escheweth evil?
word.thailand: และพระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสกับซาตานว่า "เจ้าได้ไตร่ตรองดูโยบผู้รับใช้ของเราหรือไม่ ว่าในแผ่นดินโลกไม่มีใครเหมือนเขา เป็นคนดีรอบคอบและเที่ยงธรรม เกรงกลัวพระเจ้าและหันเสียจากความชั่วร้าย"
word.spanish1909: Y Jehová dijo á Satán: ¿No has considerado á mi siervo Job, que no hay otro como él en la tierra, varón perfecto y recto, temeroso de Dios, y apartado de mal?
word.latinvulgate: Dixitque Dominus ad eum : Numquid considerasti servum meum Job, quod non sit ei similis in terra, homo simplex et rectus, ac timens Deum, et recedens a malo ?
word.italian1927: E l’Eterno disse a Satana: "Hai tu notato il mio servo Giobbe? Non ce n’è un altro sulla terra che come lui sia integro, retto, tema Iddio e fugga il male".
word.german1912: Der HERR sprach zu Satan: Hast du nicht achtgehabt auf meinen Knecht Hiob? Denn es ist seinesgleichen nicht im Lande, schlecht und recht, gottesfürchtig und meidet das Böse.
word.french1910: L'Eternel dit à Satan: As-tu remarqué mon serviteur Job? Il n'y a personne comme lui sur la terre; c'est un homme intègre et droit, craignant Dieu, et se détournant du mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華問撒但：“你有沒有注意到我的僕人約伯？世上再也沒有一個人像他那樣完全、正直，敬畏　神，遠離罪惡。”
word.korean: 여호와께서 사단에게 이르시되 네가 내 종 욥을 유의하여 보았느냐 ? 그와 같이 순전하고 정직하여 하나님을 경외하며 악에서 떠난 자가 세상에 없느니라
word.tagalog: At sinabi ng Panginoon kay Satanas, Iyo bang pinansin ang aking lingkod na si Job? sapagka't walang gaya niya sa lupa, na sakdal at matuwid na lalake, na natatakot sa Dios at humihiwalay sa kasamaan.
word.maori: Ano ra ko Ihowa ki a Hatana, Kua mahara ranei tou ngakau ki taku pononga, ki a Hopa, kahore hoki he rite mona i te whenua, he tangata ngakau tapatahi, he tika, e wehi ana i te Atua, e mawehe ana i te kino?
word.cebuano: Ug si Jehova miingon kang Satanas; Gipalandong mo ba si Job nga akong alagad? Kay walay sama kaniya diha sa yuta, hingpit ug matarung nga tawo, usa nga mahadlokon sa Dios, ug nagapahilayo sa dautan.
word.hebrew: ח ויאמר יהוה אל השטן השמת לבך על עבדי איוב  כי אין כמהו בארץ איש תם וישר ירא אלהים וסר מרע
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר יהוה אל השטן השמת לבך על עבדי איוב כי אין כמהו בארץ איש תם וישר ירא אלהים וסר מרע׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπεν αὐτῷ ὁ κύριος προσέσχες τῇ διανοίᾳ σου κατὰ τοῦ παιδός μου ιωβ ὅτι οὐκ ἔστιν κατ' αὐτὸν τῶν ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς ἄνθρωπος ἄμεμπτος ἀληθινός θεοσεβής ἀπεχόμενος ἀπὸ παντὸς πονηροῦ πράγματος

word.kjv: And the LORD said unto Satan, Hast thou considered my servant Job, that there is none like him in the earth, a perfect and an upright man, one that feareth God, and escheweth evil? and still he holdeth fast his integrity, although thou movedst me against him, to destroy him without cause.
word.thailand: และพระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสกับซาตานว่า "เจ้าได้ไตร่ตรองดูโยบผู้รับใช้ของเราหรือไม่ว่า บนแผ่นดินโลกไม่มีใครเหมือนเขา เป็นคนดีรอบคอบและเที่ยงธรรม เกรงกลัวพระเจ้าและหันเสียจากความชั่วร้าย เขายังยึดมั่นในความซื่อสัตย์ของเขาอยู่ ถึงแม้เจ้าชวนเราให้ต่อสู้กับเขา เพื่อทำลายเขาโดยไม่มีเหตุ"
word.spanish1909: Y Jehová dijo á Satán: ¿No has considerado á mi siervo Job, que no hay otro como él en la tierra, varón perfecto y recto, temeroso de Dios y apartado de mal, y que aun retiene su perfección, habiéndome tú incitado contra él, para que lo arruinara sin caus
word.latinvulgate: Et dixit Dominus ad Satan : Numquid considerasti servum meum Job, quod non sit ei similis in terra, vir simplex et rectus, ac timens Dem, et recedens a malo, et adhuc retinens innocentiam ? Tu autem commovisti me adversus eum, ut affligerem eum frustra.
word.italian1927: "Hai tu notato il mio servo Giobbe? Non ce n’è un altro sulla terra che come lui sia integro, retto, tema Iddio e fugga il male. Egli si mantiene saldo nella sua integrità benché tu m’abbia incitato contro di lui per rovinarlo senza alcun motivo".
word.german1912: Der HERR sprach zu dem Satan: Hast du nicht acht auf meinen Knecht Hiob gehabt? Denn es ist seinesgleichen im Lande nicht, schlecht und recht, gottesfürchtig und meidet das Böse und hält noch fest an seiner Frömmigkeit; du aber hast mich bewogen, daß ich ihn ohne Ursache verderbt habe.
word.french1910: L'Eternel dit à Satan: As-tu remarqué mon serviteur Job? Il n'y a personne comme lui sur la terre; c'est un homme intègre et droit, craignant Dieu, et se détournant du mal. Il demeure ferme dans son intégrité, et tu m'excites à le perdre sans motif.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華問撒但：“你有沒有注意到我的僕人約伯？世上再也沒有一個人像他那樣完全、正直，敬畏　神，遠離罪惡。雖然你挑撥我與他作對，無緣無故使他傾家蕩產，他還是堅守自己的純全。”
word.korean: 여호와께서 사단에게 이르시되 네가 내 종 욥을 유의하여 보았느냐 ? 그와 같이 순전하고 정직하여 하나님을 경외하며 악에서 떠난 자가 세상에 없느니라 네가 나를 격동하여 까닭없이 그를 치게 하였어도 그가 오히려 자기의 순전을 굳게 지켰느니라
word.tagalog: At sinabi ng Panginoon kay Satanas, Iyo bang pinansin ang aking lingkod na si Job? sapagka't walang gaya niya sa lupa, na sakdal at matuwid na lalake, na natatakot sa Dios, at humihiwalay sa kasamaan: at siya'y namamalagi sa kaniyang pagtatapat, bagaman ako'y kinilos mo laban sa kaniya, upang ilugmok siya ng walang kadahilanan.
word.maori: Na ka mea a Ihowa ki a Hatana, Kua mahara ranei tou ngakau ki taku tangata, ki a Hopa? kahore he rite mona i te whenua, he tangata ngakau tapatahi, he tika, e wehi ana i te Atua, e mawehe ana i te kino; u tonu ano hoki tona tapatahitanga, ahakoa e whakaoho ana koe i ahau ki te he mona, kia whakangaromia noatia ia.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jehova miingon kang Satanas: Gipalandong mo ba ang akong sulogoon nga si Job? kay walay sama kaniya diha sa yuta, usa ka tawong hingpit ug matarung mahadlokon siya sa Dios, ug nagpahilayo sa dautan; ug siya nagapadayon gihapon sa iyang katul-id, bisan ako giagda mo batok kaniya, aron sa paglaglag kaniya sa walay hinungdan.
word.hebrew: ג ויאמר יהוה אל השטן השמת לבך אל עבדי איוב--כי אין כמהו בארץ איש תם וישר ירא אלהים וסר מרע ועדנו מחזיק בתמתו ותסיתני בו לבלעו חנם
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר יהוה אל השטן השמת לבך אל עבדי איוב כי אין כמהו בארץ איש תם וישר ירא אלהים וסר מרע ועדנו מחזיק בתמתו ותסיתני בו לבלעו חנם׃
word.greekot: εἶπεν δὲ ὁ κύριος πρὸς τὸν διάβολον προσέσχες οὖν τῷ θεράποντί μου ιωβ ὅτι οὐκ ἔστιν κατ' αὐτὸν τῶν ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς ἄνθρωπος ἄκακος ἀληθινός ἄμεμπτος θεοσεβής ἀπεχόμενος ἀπὸ παντὸς κακοῦ ἔτι δὲ ἔχεται ἀκακίας σὺ δὲ εἶπας τὰ ὑπάρχοντα αὐτοῦ διὰ κενῆς ἀπολέσαι

word.kjv: Behold, God will not cast away a perfect man, neither will he help the evil doers:
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระเจ้าจะไม่ทรงทอดทิ้งคนดีรอบคอบ หรือค้ำจุนผู้กระทำความชั่วร้าย
word.spanish1909: He aquí, Dios no aborrece al perfecto, Ni toma la mano de los malignos.
word.latinvulgate: Deus non projiciet simplicem, nec porriget manum malignis,
word.italian1927: No, Iddio non rigetta l’uomo integro, ne porge aiuto a quelli che fanno il male.
word.german1912: Darum siehe, daß Gott nicht verwirft die Frommen und erhält nicht die Hand der Boshaften,
word.french1910: Non, Dieu ne rejette point l'homme intègre, Et il ne protège point les méchants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神不丟棄完全人看哪，　神必不離棄完全人，也不扶助行惡的人之手；
word.korean: 하나님은 순전한 사람을 버리지 아니하시고 악한 자를 붙들어 주지 아니하신즉
word.tagalog: Narito, hindi itatakuwil ng Dios ang sakdal na tao, ni aalalayan man niya ang mga manggagawa ng kasamaan.
word.maori: ¶ Nana, e kore te Atua e whakakahore ki te tangata tika, e kore ano e puritia e ia te ringa o nga tangata kino.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, ang Dios dili mosalikway sa usa ka tawong hingpit. Ni motabang siya sa mga mamumuhat sa dautan.
word.hebrew: כ  הן-אל לא ימאס-תם    ולא-יחזיק ביד-מרעים
word.hebrewmodern: הן אל לא ימאס תם ולא יחזיק ביד מרעים׃
word.greekot: ὁ γὰρ κύριος οὐ μὴ ἀποποιήσηται τὸν ἄκακον πᾶν δὲ δῶρον ἀσεβοῦς οὐ δέξεται

word.kjv: If I justify myself, mine own mouth shall condemn me: if I say, I am perfect, it shall also prove me perverse.
word.thailand: ถ้าข้าอ้างว่าตัวชอบธรรม ปากของข้าจะกล่าวโทษข้า ถ้าข้าอ้างว่าตัวดีรอบคอบ พระองค์จะพิสูจน์ว่าข้าบกพร่อง
word.spanish1909: Si yo me justificare, me condenará mi boca; Si me dijere perfecto, esto me hará inicuo.
word.latinvulgate: Si justificare me voluero, os meum condemnabit me ; si innocentem ostendero, pravum me comprobabit.
word.italian1927: Fossi pur giusto, la mia bocca stessa mi condannerebbe; fossi pure integro, essa mi farebbe dichiarar perverso.
word.german1912: Sage ich, daß ich gerecht bin, so verdammt er mich doch; bin ich Unschuldig, so macht er mich doch zu Unrecht.
word.french1910: Suis-je juste, ma bouche me condamnera; Suis-je innocent, il me déclarera coupable.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 即使我有理，我的口還是定我有罪；即使我完全，我的口還是判我乖謬。
word.korean: 가령 내가 의로울지라도 내 입이 나를 정죄하리니 가령 내가 순전할지라도 나의 패괴함을 증거하리라
word.tagalog: Kahiman ako'y matuwid, ang aking sariling bibig ay hahatol sa akin: kahiman ako'y sakdal patototohanan niya akong masama.
word.maori: Ahakoa he tika ahau, ma toku mangai ano ahau e whakahe; ahakoa he tikanga tapatahi taku, ma reira ano e whakaatu toku ngaunga ketanga.
word.cebuano: Bisan kong ako matarung pa, ang akong kaugalingong baba magahukom kanako: Bisan kong ako hingpit pa, kana magapadayag nga ako dautan.
word.hebrew: כ  אם-אצדק פי ירשיעני    תם-אני ויעקשני
word.hebrewmodern: אם אצדק פי ירשיעני תם אני ויעקשני׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν γὰρ ὦ δίκαιος τὸ στόμα μου ἀσεβήσει ἐάν τε ὦ ἄμεμπτος σκολιὸς ἀποβήσομαι

word.kjv: Though I were perfect, yet would I not know my soul: I would despise my life.
word.thailand: ถึงแม้ข้าดีรอบคอบ ข้าก็ไม่เข้าใจตัวข้าเอง ข้าจะเกลียดชีวิตของข้า
word.spanish1909: Bien que yo fuese íntegro, no conozco mi alma: Reprocharé mi vida.
word.latinvulgate: Etiam si simplex fuero, hoc ipsum ignorabit anima mea, et tædebit me vitæ meæ.
word.italian1927: Integro! Sì, lo sono! di me non mi preme, io disprezzo la vita!
word.german1912: Ich bin unschuldig! ich frage nicht nach meiner Seele, begehre keines Lebens mehr.
word.french1910: Innocent! Je le suis; mais je ne tiens pas à la vie, Je méprise mon existence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我雖然完全，卻不顧我自己，倒厭惡我的生命。
word.korean: 나는 순전하다마는 내가 나를 돌아보지 아니하고 내 생명을 천히 여기는구나
word.tagalog: Ako'y sakdal; hindi ko talos ang aking sarili; aking niwalang kabuluhan ang aking buhay.
word.maori: He tapatahi ahau; kahore ahau e whakaaro ki ahau ano; e whakahawea ana ahau ki toku ora.
word.cebuano: Ako hingpit; ako wala magtagad sa akong kaugalingon; Gibiay-biay ko ang akong kinabuhi
word.hebrew: כא  תם-אני לא-אדע נפשי    אמאס חיי
word.hebrewmodern: תם אני לא אדע נפשי אמאס חיי׃
word.greekot: εἴτε γὰρ ἠσέβησα οὐκ οἶδα τῇ ψυχῇ πλὴν ὅτι ἀφαιρεῖταί μου ἡ ζωή

word.kjv: This is one thing, therefore I said it, He destroyeth the perfect and the wicked.
word.thailand: ก็เหมือนกันหมด เพราะฉะนั้นข้าจึงว่า `พระองค์ทรงทำลายทั้งคนดีรอบคอบและคนชั่ว'
word.spanish1909: Una cosa resta que yo diga: Al perfecto y al impío él los consume.
word.latinvulgate: Unum est quod locutus sum : et innocentem et impium ipse consumit.
word.italian1927: Per me è tutt’uno! perciò dico: "Egli distrugge ugualmente l’integro ed il malvagio.
word.german1912: Es ist eins, darum sage ich: Er bringt um beide, den Frommen und den Gottlosen.
word.french1910: Qu'importe après tout? Car, j'ose le dire, Il détruit l'innocent comme le coupable.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 所以我說，善惡都是一樣，完全人和惡人，他都滅盡。
word.korean: 일이 다 일반이라 그러므로 나는 말하기를 하나님이 순전한 자나 악한 자나 멸망시키신다 하나니
word.tagalog: Lahat ay isa; kaya't aking sinasabi: kaniyang ginigiba ang sakdal at ang masama.
word.maori: ¶ He kotahi tonu ena; koia ahau ka mea, e whakamotitia ana e ia te tapatahi raua ko te kino.
word.cebuano: Natingub ang tanan; busa ako nagaingon: Siya naglaglag sa maayo ug sa dautan.
word.hebrew: כב  אחת היא    על-כן אמרתי--תם ורשע הוא מכלה
word.hebrewmodern: אחת היא על כן אמרתי תם ורשע הוא מכלה׃
word.greekot: διὸ εἶπον μέγαν καὶ δυνάστην ἀπολλύει ὀργή

word.kjv: Canst thou by searching find out God? canst thou find out the Almighty unto perfection?
word.thailand: ท่านจะหยั่งรู้สภาพของพระเจ้าได้หรือ ท่านหยั่งรู้องค์ผู้ทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์ได้หมดหรือ
word.spanish1909: ¿Alcanzarás tú el rastro de Dios? ¿Llegarás tú á la perfección del Todopoderoso?
word.latinvulgate: Forsitan vestigia Dei comprehendes, et usque ad perfectum Omnipotentem reperies ?
word.italian1927: Puoi tu scandagliare le profondità di Dio? arrivare a conoscere appieno l’Onnipotente?
word.german1912: Meinst du, daß du wissest, was Gott weiß, und wollest es so vollkommen treffen wie der Allmächtige?
word.french1910: Prétends-tu sonder les pensées de Dieu, Parvenir à la connaissance parfaite du Tout-Puissant?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神洞悉人的罪　神高深莫測之事你怎能查出呢？全能者的終極你怎能洞悉呢？
word.korean: 네가 하나님의 오묘를 어찌 능히 측량하며 전능자를 어찌 능히 온전히 알겠느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Masusumpungan mo ba ang Dios sa pagsaliksik? Masusumpungan mo ba sa kasakdalan ang Makapangyarihan sa lahat?
word.maori: ¶ Ina whakatakina e koe, e kitea ranei e koe te Atua? E tino kitea rawatia ranei e koe te Kaha Rawa?
word.cebuano: Makakaplag ka ba sa Dios pinaagi sa pagpangita? Makakab-ut ka ba sa pagkahingpit sa Makagagahum?
word.hebrew: ז  החקר אלוה תמצא    אם עד-תכלית שדי תמצא
word.hebrewmodern: החקר אלוה תמצא אם עד תכלית שדי תמצא׃
word.greekot: ἦ ἴχνος κυρίου εὑρήσεις ἢ εἰς τὰ ἔσχατα ἀφίκου ἃ ἐποίησεν ὁ παντοκράτωρ

word.kjv: He shall not be rich, neither shall his substance continue, neither shall he prolong the perfection thereof upon the earth.
word.thailand: เขาจะไม่มั่งมี และทรัพย์สมบัติของเขาจะไม่ทนทาน และข้าวของของเขาจะไม่เพิ่มพูนในแผ่นดิน
word.spanish1909: No enriquecerá, ni será firme su potencia, Ni extenderá por la tierra su hermosura.
word.latinvulgate: Non ditabitur, nec perseverabit substantia ejus, nec mittet in terra radicem suam.
word.italian1927: Ei non s’arricchirà, la sua fortuna non sarà stabile; né le sue possessioni si stenderanno sulla terra.
word.german1912: Er wird nicht reich bleiben, und sein Gut wird nicht bestehen, und sein Glück wird sich nicht ausbreiten im Lande.
word.french1910: Il ne s'enrichira plus, sa fortune ne se relèvera pas, Sa prospérité ne s'étendra plus sur la terre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他不再富足，他的財富不能持久，他的產業也不得在地上擴張，
word.korean: 그는 부요하지 못하고 재산이 항상 있지 못하며 그 산업이 땅에서 증식하지 못할 것이며
word.tagalog: Hindi siya yayaman, o mamamalagi man ang kaniyang pag-aari. Ni di lalawak sa lupa ang kaniyang mga tinatangkilik.
word.maori: E kore ia e whai taonga, e kore ano ona rawa e mau, e kore ano hoki to ratou hua e taupe ki te whenua.
word.cebuano: Siya dili gayud madato, dili usab magapadayon ang iyang bahandi, Ang ilang mga abut dili usab modagsang sa ibabaw sa yuta.
word.hebrew: כט  לא-יעשר ולא-יקום חילו    ולא-יטה לארץ מנלם
word.hebrewmodern: לא יעשר ולא יקום חילו ולא יטה לארץ מנלם׃
word.greekot: οὔτε μὴ πλουτισθῇ οὔτε μὴ μείνῃ αὐτοῦ τὰ ὑπάρχοντα οὐ μὴ βάλῃ ἐπὶ τὴν γῆν σκιὰν

word.kjv: Is it any pleasure to the Almighty, that thou art righteous? or is it gain to him that thou makest thy ways perfect?
word.thailand: ถ้าท่านเป็นคนชอบธรรม จะเป็นที่พอพระทัยแก่องค์ผู้ทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์หรือ หรือถ้าทางทั้งหลายของท่านดีรอบคอบจะเป็นประโยชน์อะไรแก่พระองค์
word.spanish1909: ¿Tiene su contentamiento el Omnipotente en que tú seas justificado, O provecho de que tú hagas perfectos tus caminos?
word.latinvulgate: Qui prodest Deo, si justus fueris ? aut quid ei confers, si immaculata fuerit via tua ?
word.italian1927: Se sei giusto, ne vien forse qualche diletto all’Onnipotente? Se sei integro nella tua condotta, ne ritrae egli un guadagno?
word.german1912: Meinst du, dem Allmächtigen liege daran, daß du gerecht seist? Was hilft's ihm, wenn deine Wege ohne Tadel sind?
word.french1910: Si tu es juste, est-ce à l'avantage du Tout-Puissant? Si tu es intègre dans tes voies, qu'y gagne-t-il?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你為人公義可討全能者喜悅嗎？你行為完全可有利於他呢？
word.korean: 네가 의로운들 전능자에게 무슨 기쁨이 있겠으며 네 행위가 온전한들 그에게 무슨 이익이 있겠느냐 ?
word.tagalog: May kasayahan ba sa Makapangyarihan sa lahat na ikaw ay matuwid? O may pakinabang ba sa kaniya na iyong pinasasakdal ang iyong mga lakad?
word.maori: He oranga ngakau ranei ki te Kaha Rawa tou tika? Hei taonga ranei ki a ia, ki te meinga e koe ou ara kia tino tika?
word.cebuano: Makalipay ba sa Makagagahum, nga ikaw matarung? Kun magpulos ba kaniya kanang imong paghingpit sa imong mga dalan?
word.hebrew: ג  החפץ לשדי כי תצדק    ואם-בצע כי-תתם דרכיך
word.hebrewmodern: החפץ לשדי כי תצדק ואם בצע כי תתם דרכיך׃
word.greekot: τί γὰρ μέλει τῷ κυρίῳ ἐὰν σὺ ἦσθα τοῖς ἔργοις ἄμεμπτος ἢ ὠφέλεια ὅτι ἁπλώσῃς τὴν ὁδόν σου

word.kjv: He setteth an end to darkness, and searcheth out all perfection: the stones of darkness, and the shadow of death.
word.thailand: มนุษย์กำจัดความมืด และค้นหาไปยังเขตไกลที่สุด ค้นแร่ดิบในที่มืดครึ้มและเงามัจจุราช
word.spanish1909: A las tinieblas puso término, Y examina todo á la perfección, Las piedras que hay en la oscuridad y en la sombra de muerte.
word.latinvulgate: Tempus posuit tenebris, et universorum finem ipse considerat, lapidem quoque caliginis et umbram mortis.
word.italian1927: L’uomo ha posto fine alle tenebre, egli esplora i più profondi recessi, per trovar le pietre che son nel buio, nell’ombra di morte.
word.german1912: Man macht der Finsternis ein Ende und findet zuletzt das Gestein tief verborgen. {~} {~}
word.french1910: L'homme fait cesser les ténèbres; Il explore, jusque dans les endroits les plus profonds, Les pierres cachées dans l'obscurité et dans l'ombre de la mort.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 人探求黑暗的盡頭，查明在陰暗中的石礦，直到極處。
word.korean: 사람이 흑암을 파하고 끝까지 궁구하여 음예와 유암 중의 광석을 구하되
word.tagalog: Ang tao'y naglalagay ng wakas sa kadiliman, at sumisiyasat hanggang sa kalayulayuang hangganan ng mga bato ng kadiliman at salimuot na kadiliman.
word.maori: E whakatakotoria ana e te tangata he mutunga mai mo te pouri, e rapua ana e ia ki te tino tutukitanga atu nga kohatu o te pouri, o te atarangi o te mate.
word.cebuano: Ang tawo magapahunong sa kangitngit, Ug didto sa kahiladman magapangita, Sa mga bato nga atua sa mangitngit ug landong sa kamatayon.
word.hebrew: ג  קץ שם לחשך ולכל-תכלית הוא חוקר    אבן אפל וצלמות
word.hebrewmodern: קץ שם לחשך ולכל תכלית הוא חוקר אבן אפל וצלמות׃
word.greekot: τάξιν ἔθετο σκότει καὶ πᾶν πέρας αὐτὸς ἐξακριβάζεται λίθος σκοτία καὶ σκιὰ θανάτου

word.kjv: For truly my words shall not be false: he that is perfect in knowledge is with thee.
word.thailand: เพราะที่จริงถ้อยคำของข้าพเจ้ามิใช่เท็จ พระองค์ผู้ทรงความรู้รอบคอบสถิตกับท่าน
word.spanish1909: Porque de cierto no son mentira mis palabras; Contigo está el que es íntegro en sus conceptos.
word.latinvulgate: Vere enim absque mendacio sermones mei, et perfecta scientia probabitur tibi.
word.italian1927: Per certo, le mie parole non son bugiarde; ti sta dinanzi un uomo dotato di perfetta scienza.
word.german1912: Meine Reden sollen ohne Zweifel nicht falsch sein; mein Verstand soll ohne Tadel vor dir sein.
word.french1910: Sois-en sûr, mes discours ne sont pas des mensonges, Mes sentiments devant toi sont sincères.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的話真的不是謊言，有一位知識全備的與你同在。
word.korean: 그 후에 음성을 발하시며 위엄의 울리는 음성을 내시고는 그 음성이 들릴 때에 번개 빛을 금치 아니하시느니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't tunay na ang aking mga salita ay hindi kabulaanan: Siyang sakdal sa kaalaman ay sumasaiyo.
word.maori: E kore rawa hoki aku kupu e teka: tenei kei a koe te tangata kua tino nui tona matauranga.
word.cebuano: Kay sa pagkamatuod ang akong mga pulong dili bakak: Kadto siya nga hingpit sa kahibalo anaa uban kanimo.
word.hebrew: ד  כי-אמנם לא-שקר מלי    תמים דעות עמך
word.hebrewmodern: כי אמנם לא שקר מלי תמים דעות עמך׃
word.greekot: ἐπ' ἀληθείας καὶ οὐκ ἄδικα ῥήματα ἀδίκως συνίεις

word.kjv: Dost thou know the balancings of the clouds, the wondrous works of him which is perfect in knowledge?
word.thailand: ท่านทราบถึงการทรงตัวของเมฆหรือ เป็นพระราชกิจอันประหลาดของพระองค์ผู้สมบูรณ์ในความรู้
word.spanish1909: ¿Has tú conocido las diferencias de las nubes, Las maravillas del Perfecto en sabiduría?
word.latinvulgate: Numquid nosti semitas nubium magnas, et perfectas scientias ?
word.italian1927: Conosci tu l’equilibrio delle nuvole, le maraviglie di colui la cui scienza è perfetta?
word.german1912: Weißt du wie sich die Wolken ausstreuen, die Wunder des, der vollkommen ist an Wissen?
word.french1910: Comprends-tu le balancement des nuées, Les merveilles de celui dont la science est parfaite?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 密雲怎樣浮於空中，那知識全備者奇妙的作為，你知道嗎？
word.korean: 네가 바다 근원에 들어갔었느냐 ? 깊은 물밑으로 걸어 다녔었느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Nalalaman mo ba ang mga pagtitimbang ng mga alapaap, ang kagilagilalas na mga gawa niya na sakdal sa kaalaman?
word.maori: E mohio ana ranei koe ki nga paunatanga o nga kapua, ki nga mahi whakamiharo a te tino o te matauranga?
word.cebuano: Nahibalo ka ba sa mga pagtulotimbang sa mga panganod, Sa mga buhat nga katingalahan niya nga hingpit sa kahibalo?
word.hebrew: טז  התדע על-מפלשי-עב    מפלאות תמים דעים
word.hebrewmodern: התדע על מפלשי עב מפלאות תמים דעים׃
word.greekot: ἐπίσταται δὲ διάκρισιν νεφῶν ἐξαίσια δὲ πτώματα πονηρῶν

word.kjv: As for God, his way is perfect: the word of the LORD is tried: he is a buckler to all those that trust in him.
word.thailand: สำหรับพระเจ้าพระองค์นี้ พระมรรคาของพระองค์ดีเลิศทุกประการ พระวจนะของพระเยโฮวาห์พิสูจน์แล้วเป็นความจริง พระองค์ทรงเป็นดั้งของบรรดาผู้ที่วางใจในพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Dios, perfecto su camino: Es acendrada la palabra de Jehová: Escudo es á todos los que en él esperan.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: La via di Dio è perfetta; la parola dell’Eterno e purgata col fuoco; egli è lo scudo di tutti quelli che sperano in lui.
word.german1912: Gottes Wege sind vollkommen; die Reden des HERRN sind durchläutert. Er ist ein Schild allen, die ihm vertrauen.
word.french1910: Les voies de Dieu sont parfaites, La parole de l'Eternel est éprouvée; Il est un bouclier pour tous ceux qui se confient en lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這位　神，他的道路是完全的；耶和華的話是煉淨的；凡是投靠他的，他都作他們的盾牌。
word.korean: 하나님의 도는 완전하고 여호와의 말씀은 정미하니 저는 자기에게 피하는 모든 자의 방패시로다
word.tagalog: Tungkol sa Dios ang kaniyang lakad ay sakdal: ang salita ng Panginoon ay subok; siya'y kalasag ng lahat na nanganganlong sa kaniya,
word.maori: Tena ko te Atua, tika tonu tona ara: kua oti tana kupu te whakamatau; he whakangungu rakau ia ki te hunga katoa e whakawhirinaki ana ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Mahitungod sa Dios, ang iyang dalan hingpit man: Ang pulong ni Jehova inulay; Siya mao ang taming sa tanang mga modangup kaniya.
word.hebrew: ל  כי-בך ארץ גדוד    ובאלהי אדלג-שור
word.hebrewmodern: האל תמים דרכו אמרת יהוה צרופה מגן הוא לכל החסים בו׃

word.kjv: It is God that girdeth me with strength, and maketh my way perfect.
word.thailand: คือพระเจ้าผู้ทรงเอากำลังคาดเอวของข้าพเจ้าไว้ และทรงกระทำให้ทางของข้าพเจ้ารอบคอบ
word.spanish1909: Dios es el que me ciñe de fuerza, E hizo perfecto mi camino;
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: l’Iddio che mi cinge di forza e rende la mia via perfetta?
word.german1912: Gott rüstet mich mit Kraft und macht meine Wege ohne Tadel.
word.french1910: C'est Dieu qui me ceint de force, Et qui me conduit dans la voie droite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他是那位以能力給我束腰的　神，他使我的道路完全。
word.korean: 이 하나님이 힘으로 내게 띠 띠우시며 내 길을 완전케 하시며
word.tagalog: Ang Dios na nagbibigkis sa akin ng kalakasan, at nagpapasakdal sa aking lakad.
word.maori: Ko te Atua, nana ahau i whitiki ki te kaha, i mea kia tino tika toku ara.
word.cebuano: Ang Dios nga nagabakus kanako sa kusog, Ug nagahingpit sa akong dalan?
word.hebrew: לב  כי מי אלוה מבלעדי יהוה    ומי צור זולתי אלהינו
word.hebrewmodern: האל המאזרני חיל ויתן תמים דרכי׃

word.kjv: The law of the LORD is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the LORD is sure, making wise the simple.
word.thailand: พระราชบัญญัติของพระเยโฮวาห์รอบคอบและฟื้นฟูจิตวิญญาณ พระโอวาทของพระเยโฮวาห์นั้นแน่นอนกระทำให้คนรู้น้อยมีปัญญา
word.spanish1909: La ley de Jehová es perfecta, que vuelve el alma: El testimonio de Jehová, fiel, que hace sabio al pequeño.
word.latinvulgate: Impleat Dominus omnes petitiones tuas ; nunc cognovi quoniam salvum fecit Dominus christum suum. Exaudiet illum de cælo sancto suo, in potentatibus salus dexteræ ejus.
word.italian1927: La legge dell’Eterno è perfetta, ella ristora l’anima; la testimonianza dell’Eterno è verace, rende savio il semplice.
word.german1912: Das Gesetz des HERRN ist vollkommen und erquickt die Seele; das Zeugnis des HERRN ist gewiß und macht die Unverständigen weise.
word.french1910: La loi de l'Eternel est parfaite, elle restaure l'âme; Le témoignage de l'Eternel est véritable, il rend sage l'ignorant.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的律法是完全的，能使人心甦醒；耶和華的法度是堅定的，能使愚人有智慧。
word.korean: 여호와의 율법은 완전하여 영혼을 소성케 하고 여호와의 증거는 확실하여 우둔한 자로 지혜롭게 하며
word.tagalog: Ang kautusan ng Panginoon ay sakdal, na nagsasauli ng kaluluwa: ang patotoo ng Panginoon ay tunay, na nagpapapantas sa hangal.
word.maori: ¶ Tapatahi tonu te ture a Ihowa, he mea whakatahuri i te wairua: pono tonu nga whakaatu a Ihowa, e whakawhaiwhakaaro ana i te kuare.
word.cebuano: Ang Kasugoan ni Jehova hingpit, nga nagapabag-o sa kalag: Ang pagpamatuod ni Jehova matinumanon, nga nagahimo nga maalam sa mga walay-pagtagad.
word.hebrew: ז  מקצה השמים מוצאו--ותקופתו על-קצותם    ואין נסתר מחמתו
word.hebrewmodern: תורת יהוה תמימה משיבת נפש עדות יהוה נאמנה מחכימת פתי׃
word.greekot: νῦν ἔγνων ὅτι ἔσωσεν κύριος τὸν χριστὸν αὐτοῦ ἐπακούσεται αὐτοῦ ἐξ οὐρανοῦ ἁγίου αὐτοῦ ἐν δυναστείαις ἡ σωτηρία τῆς δεξιᾶς αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.
word.thailand: จงหมายคนไร้ตำหนิไว้ และมองดูคนเที่ยงธรรม เพราะอนาคตของคนนั้นคือสันติภาพ
word.spanish1909: Considera al íntegro, y mira al justo: Que la postrimería de cada uno de ellos es paz.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Osserva l’uomo integro e considera l’uomo retto; perché v’è una posterità per l’uomo di pace.
word.german1912: Bleibe fromm und halte dich recht; denn solchem wird's zuletzt wohl gehen.
word.french1910: Observe celui qui est intègre, et regarde celui qui est droit; Car il y a une postérité pour l'homme de paix.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要細察完全人，觀看正直人；因為愛和平的必有後代。
word.korean: 완전한 사람을 살피고 정직한 자를 볼지어다 화평한 자의 결국은 평안이로다
word.tagalog: Tandaan mo ang sakdal na tao, at masdan mo ang matuwid: sapagka't may isang maligayang wakas sa taong may kapayapaan.
word.maori: Waitohutia te tangata tika, tirohia iho te tangata kore he: no te mea he marie te tukunga iho ki taua tangata.
word.cebuano: Timan-i ang tawong hingpit, ug tan-awa ang matarung; Kay adunay malipayong kaulahian sa tawo sa pakigdait.
word.hebrew: לז  שמר-תם וראה ישר    כי-אחרית לאיש שלום
word.hebrewmodern: שמר תם וראה ישר כי אחרית לאיש שלום׃

word.kjv: Out of Zion, the perfection of beauty, God hath shined.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าทรงทอแสงออกมาจากศิโยนนครแห่งความงามหมดจด
word.spanish1909: De Sión, perfección de hermosura, Ha Dios resplandecido.
word.latinvulgate: cum venit ad eum Nathan propheta, quando intravit ad Bethsabee.
word.italian1927: Da Sion, perfetta in bellezza, Dio è apparso nel suo fulgore.
word.german1912: Aus Zion bricht an der schöne Glanz Gottes. {~}
word.french1910: De Sion, beauté parfaite, Dieu resplendit.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神從全美的錫安，已經彰顯榮光。
word.korean: 온전히 아름다운 시온에서 하나님이 빛을 발하셨도다
word.tagalog: Mula sa Sion na kasakdalan ng kagandahan, sumilang ang Dios.
word.maori: Kua tiaho mai te Atua i roto i Hiona, i te tino o te ataahua.
word.cebuano: Gikan sa Sion, ang pagkahingpit sa katahum, Nagsidlak ang Dios.
word.hebrew: ב  מציון מכלל-יפי--    אלהים הופיע
word.hebrewmodern: מציון מכלל יפי אלהים הופיע׃
word.greekot: ἐν τῷ ἐλθεῖν πρὸς αὐτὸν ναθαν τὸν προφήτην ἡνίκα εἰσῆλθεν πρὸς βηρσαβεε

word.kjv: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect: suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.
word.thailand: ยิงออกมาจากที่ซุ่มยังคนปราศจากตำหนิ ยิงเขาทันทีและอย่างไม่กลัวเกรง
word.spanish1909: Para asaetear á escondidas al íntegro: De improviso lo asaetean, y no temen.
word.latinvulgate: Verba iniquorum prævaluerunt super nos, et impietatibus nostris tu propitiaberis.
word.italian1927: per colpire da luoghi nascosti l’uomo integro; lo colpiscono all’improvviso, e non hanno paura.
word.german1912: daß sie heimlich schießen die Frommen; plötzlich schießen sie auf ihn ohne alle Scheu.
word.french1910: Pour tirer en cachette sur l'innocent; Ils tirent sur lui à l'improviste, et n'ont aucune crainte.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要在暗地裡射殺完全的人；他們忽然射殺他，毫不懼怕。
word.korean: 숨은 곳에서 완전한 자를 쏘려 하다가 갑자기 쏘고 두려워하지 않도다
word.tagalog: Upang kanilang maihilagpos sa sakdal sa mga lihim na dako: biglang inihihilagpos nila sa kaniya at hindi natatakot.
word.maori: Hei koperenga pukutanga ma ratou ki te tangata tika; kitea rawatia ake kua kopere ki a ia, kahore hoki he wehi.
word.cebuano: Aron makapana sila sa mga hingpit diha sa awa-aw nga mga dapit: Sa kalit sila mopana kaniya, ug sila dili mahadlok.
